900811050.baseEffect_:
Rush.
At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this follower.
900811050.baseFlair_: What makes one human? In pursuit of the answer, it was crafted.
900811050.evoFlair_: What completes a human? The answer was never found. Regardless, they continued to multiply.

118821010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, restore 2 defense to your leader. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
118821010.baseFlair_: My insignificant life in this tiny capsule... how meaningless. Interfacing with the system only makes me envious of how free other life-forms are. But none of this matters. I'll probably fade out of existence soon enough anyway.
118821010.evoFlair_: I'm more than just a tiny existence in this miniature capsule! It matters how I feel and what I want to do! And I... I want to get to know you all better! To become friends!

900841140.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard your hand. Give your leader the following effect: At the end of this turn, change the enemy leader's maximum defense to 2.
900841140.baseFlair_: Born as a human, converted to evil, and summoned as a god. She sets out in pursuit of global destruction to restore all things to their primordial state, fully aware that it is an exercise in futility.
900841140.evoFlair_: Unparalleled destruction lays waste to the world. Her bloodcurdling war cries mask her screams, while her sweeping claws conceal her longing for a loving embrace. No amount of destruction can appease her, nor would all the compassion in the world get through to her.

900841150.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have 4 cards or more in your deck, banish all cards in your deck until only 3 cards remain. Then banish all other followers and amulets.
900841150.baseFlair_: Deathly slaughter is her charge, her fate, her very being. True to her namesake, she paints the skies and earth a crimson red.
900841150.evoFlair_: Her deathly fate consumes the world. When both her eyes open to reflect all of creation, every living thing is torn asunder, tinting the world in a crimson hue.

900841160.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Lose 8 play point orbs.
Reduce damage to this follower to 0.
Not affected by other cards' effects, except for those that change this card's attack or defense.
900841160.baseFlair_: Hexes and omens are her fixations, while confusion is her cadence. She intoxicates all with the melody of despair. Those who hear her siren call fall prey to her fatal charms.
900841160.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900841160.evoFlair_: The curtain of despair rises without warning. What comes to pass next is too merciless and cruel to speak of. Finality will be the tune played without surcease until the end of the world.

115814010.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, draw a card. If you have at least 3 play points, draw 2 instead and restore 2 defense to your leader. At the end of your turn, remove this effect.
115814010.baseFlair_:
One. Be silent and thoughtful. Awareness of your entire body is essential. Two. Until you are capable of coming to a complete halt, you should not so much as move a muscle.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist, Preface

713814010.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, draw a card. If you have at least 3 play points, draw 2 instead and restore 2 defense to your leader. At the end of your turn, remove this effect.
713814010.baseFlair_:
The curtains will rise any second now...
I'm not nervous—I'm just focusing.
—Karen Hojo

122814010.baseEffect_: Put an Enhanced Puppet into your hand.
122814010.baseFlair_: He was truly blessed, to have been able to witness the puppet's progress.

110824010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Put 2 copies of 2 of the following cards into your deck.
-Analyzing Artifact
-Ancient Artifact
-Mystic Artifact
-Radiant Artifact

123824010.baseEffect_:
Give Rush to an allied Portalcraft follower.
Then, if it's an Artifact follower, give it the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
123824010.baseFlair_:
"I need to resonate with your melody? But it's so slow. I can break the sound barrier, you know?" —Ralmia, Sonic Racer
"I don't care how damn fast it is, it's gonna be the world's number one hit." —Lishenna, Omen of Destruction

715824010.baseEffect_:
Give Rush to an allied Portalcraft follower.
Then, if it's an Artifact follower, give it the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
715824010.baseFlair_:
"I need to resonate with your melody? But it's so slow. I can break the sound barrier, you know?" —Ralmia, Sonic Racer
"I don't care how damn fast it is, it's gonna be the world's number one hit." —Lishenna, Omen of Destruction

107834020.baseEffect_:
Subtract 1 from the cost of an Artifact card in your hand.
Put 3 copies of that Artifact card into your deck.
107834020.baseFlair_: If evolution is the incentive, progression is the objective.

118834010.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, give -2/-2 to a random enemy follower. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, give +2/+2 to a random allied follower. At the end of your turn, remove this effect.
118834010.baseFlair_: Not content with either light or darkness, you now desire both? Splendid! Most splendid!

900834050.baseEffect_: Summon a Mystic Artifact and Ancient Artifact.
900834050.baseFlair_: I will fight. I will take down every tyrant, every reaver of worlds, every pillager of dreams. I do not forgive or forget. It's time we put an end to this.

900834060.baseEffect_:
Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Tisiphone, the Malignant
-Alecto, the Dissonant
-Megaera, the Indignant
900834060.baseFlair_: Yeah, sure, fight, do whatever. You're angry, then you're crying, and now you're like, "My emotions give me power." Oh, scary. Well, you've forgotten something important. I'm the one that stirred that resentment. So I'm still the one pulling the strings! Now get lost!

900844020.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an allied follower. Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
900844020.baseFlair_: The roar of the silverbeast lord reverberates even in the stomachs of machines with much courage.

900844050.baseEffect_:
At the start of your turn, if at least 20 allied followers that cost at least 5 play points have been destroyed this match, reveal this card from your deck, put it into your hand (up to 1 copy per turn), and recover 2 evolution points.
----------
If 3 or less of your evolution points have been used this match, put a Calamity's End into your deck. Otherwise, win the match.
900844050.baseFlair_:
All beings are fated for destruction. I had a marvelous time, but the time has come to say farewell—calamity's end is upon us.
—Leon Aurenche

900844060.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown.
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader.
900844060.baseFlair_: The melody is destruction's vector. When the idol steps off stage, the melody remains, echoing within worshippers' minds. It destroys all other thoughts. There is only destruction. Destruction. Destruction. Destruction.

115811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower whose attack or defense has been raised.
115811010.baseFlair_: Heh... You seem awfully proud of that expensive armor and weaponry. But my lance here will ferret out your weaknesses and pierce right through them!
115811010.evoFlair_: Strength is weakness and fortes are flaws. Any advantage has drawbacks, is what I'm saying. Get ready, evildoers—my lance is one sharp analyst.

117811020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
117811020.baseFlair_: Don't ask me what to do. I was born without a shred of creativity. Just give me the schematics, and I'll follow them to a T. That's all I'm good for anyway...
117811020.evoFlair_:
That guy's knack for reproducing designs is nuts. It's like he literally pulls the finished product out of the blueprints, down to the last bolt. I'm not even joking.
—A Fellow Engineer

118811020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +4/+4 and put 2 Puppets into your hand.
Once on each of your turns, when an allied Puppet comes into play, put 2 Puppets into your hand.
118811020.baseFlair_: You there! Do you know how expensive making puppets can be? But then I had a brain wave one day—as long my puppets can pass for puppets, it doesn't matter what I use to make them!
118811020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118811020.evoFlair_: I wrap some yarn round and round long enough, and I've got myself a puppet! How about that? Just think of the savings on fabric! Only problem is... now they've raised the price on yarn!

120811030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (3) - Draw a card.
When Resonance becomes active for you, gain Bane.
120811030.baseFlair_: This machine was a harmless reconnaissance bot... until its creators discovered the efficacy of upgrading it with a weapons system.
120811030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120811030.evoFlair_: An automated machine capable of dealing with threats efficiently and with minimized sacrifice. Perhaps this is, in its own way, a shortcut to peace.

121811010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Gain +10/+10.
Last Words: Put an Iron Hero into your deck.
121811010.baseFlair_: Come to me, GeniusTek Suit! Behold the armor of innovation, the emblem of intellect! Technology is only as good or evil as the one who wields it! If you're going to use my tech, then you must do it for great justice!
121811010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121811010.evoFlair_: Do I look like I'm in dire straits? Well, it's true you got a look at the face behind the helmet. But a true genius shines when their back is against the wall. To do anything less would be an insult to this marvel of technology!

122811020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
122811020.baseFlair_: Insignificant brat? I'll take that as a compliment. Better than wasting space with such a large body, if you ask me. I've perfected my thread technique for giant oafs just like you.
122811020.evoFlair_: People put so much stock in having a big body and bigger heart—as if all that deadweight doesn't just make them bigger targets for threadmasters like me.

717811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
717811010.baseFlair_: What's a tiny brat like me gonna do? Oh, you'll see. Talk big all you like, but I could catch a giant idiot like you with my eyes closed.
717811010.evoFlair_:
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.
...Aw, what's wrong? If you want me to untie you so bad, you could start by saying, "I'm a big loser who lost to a little girl." Go on. I'm waiting.

125811030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any other allied followers are in play, destroy 1 and draw a card. If you selected an Artifact follower, evolve this follower.
125811030.baseFlair_:
They call dogs man's best friend. They're loyal and reliable—mine's even equipped with state-of-the-art weapons! Just wait till they see this...
—New Mechanical Weapons Development Log, Day Before the Competition
125811030.evoFlair_:
I nearly split my sides laughing when their stupid robot-monkey thing got blown into smithereens! In just one hit too! Who's the underdog now? Heh.
—New Mechanical Weapons Development Log, Day of the Competition

717811020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any other allied followers are in play, destroy 1 and draw a card. If you selected an Artifact follower, evolve this follower.
717811020.baseFlair_:
They call dogs man's best friend. They're loyal and reliable—mine's even equipped with state-of-the-art weapons! Just wait till they see this...
—New Mechanical Weapons Development Log, Day Before the Competition
717811020.evoFlair_:
I nearly split my sides laughing when their stupid robot-monkey thing got blown into smithereens! In just one hit too! Who's the underdog now? Heh.
—New Mechanical Weapons Development Log, Day of the Competition

126811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Mystic Artifact into your hand.
126811010.baseFlair_: Is this cage really necessary? Cats aren't meant to be in enclosures. We're much more suited to curling up by a sunny window in a nice, comfortable home!
126811010.evoFlair_:
"Mrrgh! What did I tell you about leaving the estate, Rosa?"
"I'm sorry. It's just... I really wanted to see him!"
"Geez, you humans and your sentimentality."
—Mech Wing Attendant & Rosa

900811010.baseFlair_: It was created to destroy. Even if its very form is replaced, the inevitable march towards the future cannot be stopped.
900811010.evoFlair_: It was created to push forward. Even if its very form destroyed, the inevitable march towards the future cannot be stopped.

900811030.baseFlair_: Scrutinize and analyze, to fulfill the purpose of its creation. Discover meaning from naught, for it is none other than yourself.
900811030.evoFlair_: Scrutinize and analyze, to fulfill the purpose of its creation. Before you, a purpose is born from naught.

900811110.baseEffect_:
Rush.
At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this follower.
(This card will be treated as a Puppet.)
900811110.baseFlair_: Just what is a man made of? The study made it quite clear—endless depths of desire.
900811110.evoFlair_: Just what makes the core of a man? Progress made it quite clear—indomitable determination.

110821010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Miraculous Invention or Hazardous Invention into your hand.
110821010.baseFlair_: It came to me in a flash! Not just one idea, but two! Only problem is, I can't decide which one to build. Aahh, it's so hard to choose!
110821010.evoFlair_:
Combat really isn't my area of expertise... but I'm one heck of an inventor!
What? I'm a great fighter, too? Aww, c'mon, now! Don't make me blush!

112821010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Enhance (8): Put 2 random Artifact cards into your hand instead, and recover 7 play points.
112821010.baseFlair_: The first change led to discovery. Everyone saw that if you could somehow use these machines, then you would hold the power to change the world within the palm of your hand. —Robot Research Log, Part 2
112821010.evoFlair_: The possibilities of machines are limitless. They can immediately manifest the wishes of their users. I wonder how the ambitions of mankind will change the machines in turn. —Researcher's Reflections, Part 2

115821010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. If you have at least 3 play points, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and 1 damage to the enemy leader instead.
115821010.baseFlair_:
One. Training the body was once thought the only path. Know now: that path leads nowhere. Two. Temper though you might, flesh is not steel. For armor, turn to the forge.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Body
115821010.evoFlair_:
Three. Training the body is a fruitless pursuit of strength. It is not the true Way of the Fist. Four. Prepare yourself by donning steel. Only then will you find the true path.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Body

116821020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied Artifact follower and put a copy of it into your hand.
116821020.baseFlair_: Start small—it's most efficient. Go too big, and you invite careless mistakes. Remember, don't lose the machines for the factory.
116821020.evoFlair_: If you can accomplish great things by starting small, you're clever. But if you start big and end up with something small, you're an idiot. Listen, everything's made up of atoms—that's the beauty of the world.

124821010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Last Words: Put an Enhanced Puppet into your hand.
124821010.baseFlair_:
A customer of culture, I see! Yes, indeed this is the latest version of the Magna Saber, built with all-new molding technology. Behold the latest achievements in color accuracy and range of motion! Limited to one per person!
—Karakuri Inn Work Log, Audio File 3
124821010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
124821010.evoFlair_:
This karakuri here's named Shokichi, and she's in charge of the souvenir shop! She's also a total math whiz, so you can count on her to count your money right! And if you ask nicely, she might even help you with your homework!
—Karakuri Inn Work Log, Audio File 4

126821010.baseEffect_:
During your turn, whenever an allied follower evolves, put a Puppet into your hand.
Once on each of your turns, when an allied Puppet comes into play, give it Bane.
126821010.baseFlair_: My function is to clean. To decimate dirt. Security? I don't do that. It's beyond my programming. I must return to my work, so I'll leave you here. Please remove yourself, intruder.
126821010.evoFlair_: You're looking for someone who provides both cleaning and security services? I'm afraid you don't understand. I'm a tool: I can't do anything I'm not programmed to. Now, I must resume my task... I need to clean up what remains of my master.

123841020.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, change its cost to X and reveal it. X equals a random number between 2 and 10.
----------
Fanfare: Change this follower's attack and defense to Y/Y. Y equals the cost of this card.
Fanfare: Randomly activate Y of the following effects.
-Gain Ward.
-Gain Storm.
-Gain Bane.
-Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
-Restore 4 defense to your leader.
-Recover 2 play points.
-Deal 3 damage to all other followers.
-Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
-Destroy a random enemy follower.
-Draw 2 cards.
123841020.baseFlair_:
Why?! Why won't anyone believe me?! Spacetime is clearly being warped. It's like our universe is contained in a box, and someone's lifted the lid to peek inside. This is our chance to peek out!
—Writings of a Madman
123841020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish 10 random cards from your deck. Put 10 Wielder of the Cosmoses into your deck.
123841020.evoFlair_:
Parallel universes should be just that—parallel! And yet, something is intersecting ours! But what if, by studying it, we cause more quantum decoherence... No! NOOO!
—Writings of a Madman

900841010.baseEffect_: Last Words: If it is your turn, then put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If it is your opponent's turn, draw a card.
900841010.baseFlair_: This here is mine. I suppose I could break you with it if I wanted it to. —Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas
900841010.evoFlair_: Go ahead and break it, if you wish. Just so you know though, it'll break you with it. —Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas

900841050.baseFlair_: Anger. First the girl learned anger when she saw the folly and pride of men. "How come people only think of themselves?"
900841050.evoFlair_: Anger. The girl was incensed to learn of human greed and superficiality. "These people will never learn."

900841240.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards in play.
900841240.baseFlair_:
An armament... and it appears to have already locked onto its target.
—Leon Aurenche
900841240.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900841240.evoFlair_:
Overcome my trials—with every last card you have, give me everything you've got!
—Leon Aurenche

111814010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown. Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
111814010.baseFlair_: Say, if you had to pick between me or the world, which would you choose? I mean, do I even need to ask?

708814010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown. Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
708814010.baseFlair_:
That's right. He is, without question, a fake priest.
—Rin Tohsaka

114814010.baseEffect_:
Give a random Puppet in your hand +4/+0.
Enhance (7): Put 2 Puppets into your hand. Then give 2 random Puppets in your hand +4/+0 instead.
114814010.baseFlair_: For all that dolls began as human simulacrums, they seem to become more advanced the further their appearance deviates from those origins.

116814010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Analyzing Artifact
-Bifurcating Artifact
-Radiant Artifact
-Paradigm Shift
116814010.baseFlair_: They converse through the resonance of steel. Metallic sounds ring out and connect distant places, travelling much farther than organic voices.

118814010.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 3 play points, put a Mechanical Designs into your hand. At the end of your turn, remove this effect.
118814010.baseFlair_: Lack of manpower's a thing of the past.

124814010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Put 2 of the following cards into your hand.
-Puppet
-Enhanced Puppet
-Forge Weaponry
124814010.baseFlair_: Recognize, verify, and make adjustments as necessary. Rinse and repeat. Occasionally inspiration will strike, giving progress to your process.

125814010.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Enhance (8): Summon 2 Unidentified Subjects and give them Rush. Put a Cultivate Life into your deck.
125814010.baseFlair_:
Some consider it the highest form of blasphemy against nature.
Others consider it the realization of man's ultimate destiny.

107824020.baseEffect_:
Put an Analyzing Artifact into your deck.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
107824020.baseFlair_: If I were a god, I would have never created humans. I'd prefer something much simpler, much more obedient—a servant.

113824010.baseEffect_:
Put a Radiant Artifact into your deck.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
113824010.baseFlair_:
One could say these blueprints are like a letter from an era gone by. The author's fervor is palpable from the design alone.
—Studious Engineer

713824010.baseEffect_:
Put a Radiant Artifact into your deck.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.

114824010.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, put a Radiant Artifact into your hand.
114824010.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the scientists discovered her kindness during their research, they saw an advanced, marvelous aether. They soon learned that it grants power to those who test the boundaries of civilization.

117824010.baseEffect_: Put copies of 2 different random allied Artifact cards destroyed this match into your hand. Then, if at least 6 different allied Artifact cards have been destroyed this match, change their costs to 0.
117824010.baseFlair_:
Chief sent us a missive about the most common workplace accidents. We all had a good laugh at how absurd they were, especially number twenty. Then Chief said, "Go dig up the bodies and ask them yourselves."
—Artifact Researcher

713824020.baseEffect_: Put copies of 2 different random allied Artifact cards destroyed this match into your hand. Then, if at least 6 different allied Artifact cards have been destroyed this match, change their costs to 0.
713824020.baseFlair_: Orange? Heh... That is the name of my loyalty!

120824010.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Enhance (7): Summon a Prime Artifact and give it Rush.
120824010.baseFlair_: That's the exit. If you want the entrance, it's somewhere other than here.

121824010.baseEffect_:
Put a False Slash and True Strike into your hand.
Then, if at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, subtract 1 from their costs.
121824010.baseFlair_:
"My desire is no fleeting spark. I've waited so long for this." The desire born of Purgation reaches its terminus in the land of shimmering dew. "I will offer my very life to purge this world and become a hero worthy of her—"
—Tales from Isunia, Entry 6

900824010.baseEffect_: Give Bane to an allied follower.
900824010.baseFlair_: Let's drop the pretense, shall we? The sun is nothing more than a vicious lie, preying on the gullible. Beneath the surface of the land of shimmering dew and guilds is a cesspool where ideals go to die. That is why I shall sweep it all away with the power of Purgation.

112834010.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect until the end of this turn: Whenever an allied Artifact card comes into play, recover 1 play point and draw a card.
112834010.baseFlair_: Lighting lamps and consulting maps, humans are guided through this world by their tools. It is for this reason that technology is, in fact, a form of divinity worthy of worship.

709834010.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect until the end of this turn: Whenever an allied Artifact card comes into play, recover 1 play point and draw a card.
709834010.baseFlair_: I did not expect to be testing this prototype so soon.

120834010.baseEffect_:
Remove all effects on an enemy follower except changes to attack or defense.
Subtract 1 from the cost of all Paradigm Shifts in your hand.
120834010.baseFlair_:
Amorphous quicksilver, let my will give you form.
—Shion, Mercurial Aegis

123834010.baseEffect_:
Burial Rite: Put a copy of that follower into your hand.
Then, if at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, put a copy of a random allied 3-play-point follower and 4-play-point follower destroyed this match into your hand.
123834010.baseFlair_:
"Let me take over your whole life! Idolize me more!"
—Lishenna, Melodious Destruction
"You can destroy my data, but I'll just back it up again! My systems are running faster than ever!"
—Ralmia, Astrowing

125834010.baseEffect_:
Put a Deus Ex Machina into your hand.
If you have more evolution points than your opponent, change its cost to 3. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Put an Analyzing Artifact and Biofabrication into your deck.
125834010.baseFlair_: The absurdity of the gods made manifest. But do not be quick to bemoan its existence, for it is always the selfish will of mankind that brings about these divine machinations.

717834010.baseEffect_:
Put a Deus Ex Machina into your hand.
If you have more evolution points than your opponent, change its cost to 3. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Put an Analyzing Artifact and Biofabrication into your deck.

900834010.baseFlair_: Go on now: swear to the light. —Demon of the Gaps

900834020.baseEffect_: Give a follower +2/+0. Then remove all effects from that follower except changes to its attack or defense.
900834020.baseFlair_: Go on now: wander through the dark. —Demon of the Gaps

900834070.baseEffect_: Put a copy of a random allied follower played this turn (excluding Lunalu, Fangirl A) into your hand.
900834070.baseFlair_: My pen and my body are ready!

122844010.baseEffect_:
Put 2 Magisterial Dreadnoughts into your deck.
At the end of your turn, put a random follower that costs at least 5 play points from your deck into your hand.
122844010.baseFlair_:
It seems the time has finally come... I suppose I should be thankful for those who supported me along the way. Now let us begin—the evolution of mankind.
—Leon Aurenche

900844030.baseEffect_:
Give -10/-0 to a random enemy follower.
Banish a random enemy amulet.
Give the enemy leader the following effect: At the start of your next turn, lose 1 play point.
900844030.baseFlair_: There are proper ways to doin' things—precepts which must never be broken. But here you've gone, like some common ingrate, and broken the most important one: never piss me off. That'll be 100,000 gold, the full value of which I will receive immediately.

900844070.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn: Reduce damage from effects to 0.
900844070.baseFlair_:
O formless mercury, annihilate the all-consuming malice.
—Shion, Immortal Aegis

107813030.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give it Rush.
Whenever you play an Artifact card, recover 1 play point.
107813030.baseFlair_: Wings? I'd prefer something with a little more sophistication. —Geno, Machine Artisan

109813010.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 1 play point and Resonance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as an Artifact Squadron or Artifact's Glow.
----------
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact, Prime Artifact.
109813010.baseFlair_: Occasionally the contraptions of antiquity become the innovations of posterity.

900813010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the start of your turn, put a random Artifact card that costs at least 3 play points from your deck into your hand.
900813010.baseFlair_: Warriors roused from antiquity shall take up arms once again.

900813020.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Whenever you play an Artifact card, restore 1 defense to your leader.
900813020.baseFlair_: Radiance roused from antiquity shall illuminate the day once again.

107823010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Analyzing Artifact, Ancient Artifact, Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact.
107823010.baseFlair_: Absorbing traces of magical power, it amplifies and supplies it, as if a maternal provider to those who are willing to come take it.

900822020.baseEffect_:
Can't be destroyed by effects.
At the end of your turn, if the enemy leader has 10 defense or less, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower and 1 damage to the enemy leader, then banish this amulet.
900822020.baseFlair_: I call this one the Too-Hot-to-Handle!

107833010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and add 2 to this amulet's Countdown.
While this amulet is in play, your leader can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
107833010.baseFlair_: The path to omnipotence exists within the beyond.

111843010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (25)
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Subtract 15 from this amulet's Countdown.
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 2 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon an Avatar of Desecration.
111843010.baseFlair_:
"Drink in defilement!"
"Purify it!"
They flirted with forbidden knowledge, a sinister gambol with blasphemy and corruption, and created something inhuman—something to transcend humanity.

100811020.baseFlair_: Behold, and see! My beloved puppet dances with delight, almost as if it lives!
100811020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Puppet into your hand. Give a random Puppet in your hand Bane.
100811020.evoFlair_: Oh, my beloved puppet... it seems that I've not bestowed upon you enough life. Hmm... Yes, of course—let's simply take theirs!

100811060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
100811060.baseFlair_: Do you know my master? I see. In that case, say goodnight!
100811060.evoFlair_: Where is my master? Is it you? Hm. Maybe. Prove it to me!

100811070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Analyzing Artifacts into your deck.
100811070.baseFlair_: Grr... Roar! (Beat it, kid! My master has no interest in punks like you!)
100811070.evoFlair_: Rra... Rawrgh ! (You still here? You're not worth a second of my master's time! Worthless! Worthless, I say!)

107811020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Gain +1/+1. Put a Puppet into your hand.
107811020.baseFlair_: I'm looking for a soul, for science. If I give one to teddy, surely he'll talk, right?
107811020.evoFlair_: I'm gonna give your soul to teddy, see? This way, I'll never be alone.

107811090.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select a follower in your hand (excluding Hamelin) that originally costs 3 play points or less. Put a copy of that follower into your hand.
107811090.baseFlair_: Dear listeners, join me on a musical journey! Just follow the tune of my magical melodies—the sound of my pipe compels you!
107811090.evoFlair_: It's the march that never ends—nowhere and forever! Hey, where do you think you're going? Just follow me!

107811100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Analyzing Artifact, Ancient Artifact, Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact.
107811100.baseFlair_: I don't believe it—I'm actually flying! That lady's a genius!
107811100.evoFlair_: It's like a dream! Soaring through the skies, I'll be unstoppable—even dragons won't stand a chance!

107811130.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and gain Rush and Bane.
107811130.baseFlair_: It was just supposed to be a ledger of sorts—I didn't think it'd actually come to life. —Master Puppeteer
107811130.evoFlair_: My laboratory, reduced to ashes—how am I supposed to take notes now? —Banished Puppeteer

108811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Prime Artifact into your deck.
108811010.baseFlair_: Artifacts aren't just objects. They're living witnesses to history. But everyone's forgotten them. That's why these girls are so lonely.
108811010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
108811010.evoFlair_: Artifacts aren't just objects. Their bodies are filled with history. Try to remember... remember what the world used to look like.

109811020.baseEffect_: When an allied Artifact follower comes into play, this follower gains Ward.
109811020.baseFlair_: Sometimes I can getcha up and running and sometimes ya won't even turn on. I think I'll call ya... The "I dunno if you'll work this time" machine! —An Inventor
109811020.evoFlair_: So ya work better when your buddies are around, eh? Then I'll call ya the "Looks scary but actually just lookin' fer friends" machine! —An Inventor

110811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put either a Guardform Golem or a Strikeform Golem into your deck. If Resonance is active for you, put both a Guardform Golem and a Strikeform Golem into your deck instead.
110811010.baseFlair_: Haha, I might be a genius! If something has no fixed form, that just means it can be shaped into anything! All right, my cute little golems! Let's try some more exciting looks!
110811010.evoFlair_:
"Huh... For imitations, these aren't half bad."
—Paracelsus

112811010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and put 2 Puppets into your hand.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, put a Puppet into your hand.
112811010.baseFlair_: Excuse me... Can you help me? I know I look like a doll, but actually an evil man trapped my soul inside this puppet! Will you please help me look for my original body?
112811010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112811010.evoFlair_: Thank you! It's hard to move this doll's joints, the clothes are too cute and fluffy, and I just feel completely helpless. If I had tear ducts, I would've already cried my eyes out. But now that I'm with you, I have a good feeling I'll finally relocate my body!

112811030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Bifurcating Artifacts into your deck.
112811030.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a variety of phenomena. When the orb was unearthed, it brought forth wide-reaching change; the machines had come. —Robot Research Log, Part 1
112811030.evoFlair_: The existence of this core will advance both human and machinekind. It's given us plenty to hypothesize about, so now all that's left is proper experimentation. I wonder how the world will change from our discoveries. —Researcher's Reflections, Part 1

113811010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put 2 Ancient Artifacts into your deck.
113811010.baseFlair_:
Cat Cannoneer?
I don't appreciate being lumped together with her, ya meow! Her cannon's totally lacking on paw-er, see what I mean? This is a brand-new original creation, the Paw-Cannon!
113811010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113811010.evoFlair_:
"Hey! Your Paw-Cannon's totally ripping off mine!"
"It's not a rip-off, it's, uh, an homage!"
—Cat Cannoneer and Cat Gunner

114811020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Put a Puppet into your hand and give it Bane.
114811020.baseFlair_: As the current head of a long line of puppet masters, I've grown fond of making puppets geared toward children. Yet the customers don't come by my shop anymore. I wonder why...
114811020.evoFlair_: I see now where I had erred. I was too obsessed with tradition, and as such the masses find my work to be out-of-date. So I've decided to keep up with the times. Behold my latest creation—dearest Julie!

114811030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
114811030.baseFlair_:
Concept: Enforce with both weaponry and armor.
Subjects: Small, weak animals.
Mission: Preserve endangered species.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team A
114811030.evoFlair_: We've succeeded with part one of the plan. Though the change in ecology resulting from expansion of their habitat came unexpectedly. Nonetheless, we'll continue to observe their ongoing war against bladed hedgehogs. For the good of all of us.

115811030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you or if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
115811030.baseFlair_:
Concept: Reinforcement of weak points.
Subjects: Animals with substandard senses.
Mission: Research wild animals' potential.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team D
115811030.evoFlair_: Above is a mole we've seen often of late. Reclaiming its species' lost visual acuity has given it a whole new way of life. We must continue to observe this artificially-induced evolution. For the good of all of us.

116811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
116811010.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis brought about new technology. We no longer need extensive equipment or advanced facilities to tinker with machinery. As a result, devices have grown lighter and inventing more efficient. —Tech Research and Development, Report 1
116811010.evoFlair_:
Technology, and therefore machinery, exists for its own sake. As such, inventors believe that one day machines will surpass humanity. The world toddles towards a completely mechanized future, free of human influence.
—Boon of Technology, Part 1

117811010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
117811010.baseFlair_: Witness the Two of Cups, flowing in unison. Bound as they are, the two souls steal gazes at each other when the master isn't looking. Though this affair may be fleeting, their lovestruck hearts yearn for an encore.
117811010.evoFlair_: Greetings from the puppet master, tugger of heartstrings. See, people bemoan the rifts that drive them apart. But I warp space so they may come together... So what if the joy I bring is manufactured? It's real to them, and that's all that matters.

119811010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Summon a Mechanized Soldier.
Enhance (6): Summon 2 instead.
Enhance (8): Summon 3 instead, and give all allied Mechanized Soldiers the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
119811010.baseFlair_:
Tools of metal cost time and money to make and maintain.
Tools of flesh are ready made and need only an upgrade.
119811010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +1/+1 to all other allied Mechanized Soldiers.
119811010.evoFlair_:
When tools of metal break, one must take the time to pick up the broken parts.
When tools of flesh break, one need only leave them to turn into compost on their own.

120811010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, put an Analyzing Artifact into your deck and restore 1 defense to your leader.
120811010.baseFlair_: Energy is like food for machines—and a heaping serving is just right! After all, we wouldn't want them to get hungry before their next meal, would we? Uh... Oh, no! I think I broke it!
120811010.evoFlair_:
Eat too much and you'll get a tummy ache. The same goes for machines.
—Magic Gunsmith

123811020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put an Enhanced Puppet into your hand.
123811020.baseFlair_:
I know I'm not perfect, but I was handmade with love!
...Even though I'm flawed, will you still love me too?
123811020.evoFlair_: Factory-made cookie-cutter dolls are so... soulless. But me? I'm one of a kind!

124811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
124811010.baseFlair_:
What is up, fellows? Shout-outs for choosing to stay at our rad AF establishment. Let's see... One reservation for the Kabuto Room. The view from there? Godlike. Hehe... I hope my lessons on modern slang are paying off!
—Karakuri Inn Work Log, Audio File 1
124811010.evoFlair_:
Little Chachako here's the head waitress of the inn! Her face might not express much, but she'll do all she can to make your stay a pleasant one! Oh, but try not to praise her too much, as her face might catch fire!
—Karakuri Inn Work Log, Audio File 2

124811020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put a Guardform Golem or Strikeform Golem into your hand.
124811020.baseFlair_: A true innovator doesn't sit around and wait for ideas to come to them, but seeks out inspiration for themselves!
124811020.evoFlair_:
"The professor's run away!"
"Again?! But our deadline's right around the corner!"
—Panicking Lab Assistants

125811010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give an allied Puppet the following effect - Last Words: Summon a Blossoming Flower Doll.
Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
125811010.baseFlair_: This garden is eternal, unaffected by the passage of time. But that does not mean it is unchanging. No flower blooms the same way as another—this I have observed over many years. I will document their differences, and remember them.
125811010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
125811010.evoFlair_: In this eternal garden, I am the only flower that remains the same. And this is fine. Preferable, even. As the caretaker of this garden, it is my duty, and my wish, to do my work in perpetuity.

100821010.baseFlair_: To unravel the secrets of life, it is only logical to dismantle all lives. That is what master has requested—what master wishes for.
100821010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
100821010.evoFlair_: This body of steel simply seeks the essence of life—to fulfill master's order, and to one day create a life for master.

107821010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Ward.
107821010.baseFlair_: The sky is my domain to explore! They aren't real, but with these wings I can fly anywhere!
107821010.evoFlair_: To protect my beloved, I'll do anything—my feelings are pure! Even if it pains me, I want to be with the one I truly love.

107821020.baseEffect_: Last Words: If you have at least 4 cards in your hand, put a Puppet into your hand. If you have 3 cards or less in your hand, put a Puppet and a Flower Doll into your hand.
107821020.baseFlair_: This is the garden of eternity. Even after my master withers away, I'll stand over and guard this grave until the end of time.
107821020.evoFlair_: This is the garden of eternity. My master loved me for the white flower I was, and for eternity I will bloom forever, here in the master's stead.

107821030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Ancient Artifacts into your deck.
107821030.baseFlair_: Hey, check out these wings! Pretty brilliant, huh? I guess you could call me a genius of sorts, I invented 'em myself!
107821030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
107821030.evoFlair_: Maybe someday there'll be wings for everyone! If we all could be so free, we could even fly all the way to the sun!

107821070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and give your leader the following effect - Subtract 3 from the next source of damage your leader takes.
107821070.baseFlair_: Yeah, I can fix it for ya—for a price, of course. Hm? What do I take for payment? I'm but a simple man, what do you think? Pay up!
107821070.evoFlair_: Listen here, buddy—I ain't running a charity. Man's gotta make a living somehow. Nothing personal, it's just business!

108821010.baseEffect_: If you have at least 2 play points and Resonance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as a L'Ange Miriam or La Diablotine Miriam.
108821010.baseFlair_: My life is synthetic, and so is my body. But my heart doesn't come from anyone else. I want to battle together with you. I really do!
108821010.evoFlair_: Other people made my life and my body. But my heart is mine and mine alone. I can be strong if we're together. I really believe I can!

110821020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown, and then draw 2 cards.
110821020.baseFlair_: Destroy, destroy, destroy. If it exists, it deserves to be destroyed. There is no future without destruction—dress for the apocalypse, dance to the damage!
110821020.evoFlair_:
The Second Order: Abide No Rule
Order is the enemy of the masses. Every desire to rebel should be carried to its fullest expression. Smash and trample everything.
—The Teachings of Team Destruction

111821010.baseFlair_: My little sister's real sick, so she's stuck in bed. But it's okay, 'cause I met a man who promised to make her live forever!
111821010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
111821010.evoFlair_:
Why... How... What's happened. To me?
My sister and. Me. We're puppets... Now.
This is wrong... This is all wrong!

113821010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
113821010.baseFlair_: All creations have their own purposes—those which must be fulfilled... And I too, shall play my part. Zahnrad, the grace of your wings shall make life dance.
113821010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
113821010.evoFlair_: No matter how many times it breaks, no matter how many times it rusts, I will always repair it. After all, there is nothing sadder than a purpose unfulfilled. Now, my gears, serve your purpose.

117821010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, put a copy of a random allied follower destroyed this match that costs X play points into your hand. X equals your remaining play points.
117821010.baseFlair_: Hark, the herald of Judgement, bringer of rejuvenation! Mender of broken bodies, lifter of spirits, and petter of four-legged friends. She'll be there to help you when no one else can.
117821010.evoFlair_: A tuner like me restores things to their original state. Waiting around for help is so dull and dumb. You can't expect it to fall into your lap. You gotta put in some effort and seek it.

118821020.baseEffect_:
Once on each of your turns, when this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, recover 1 play point.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, summon a Dutiful Steed.
118821020.baseFlair_:
As the trains race across the country, these lupine mechanisms can be seen loitering near the tracks. They maintain the integrity of the rails twenty-four hours a day. It's thanks to their support that transportation is reliable.
—Magitrains for Nimwits, Page 3
118821020.evoFlair_:
Many trains are equipped with sleeping cars to make your journey more comfortable. Open the window, and the night sky will accompany you on your ride. By the time you wake up, we'll have arrived at your destination.
—Magitrains for Nimwits, Page 4

119821010.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Choose - Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
119821010.baseFlair_: A crime is a crime, and trash is trash. No matter how lofty their morals are, a thief is still a thief—which is exactly why I work covertly—and vanish like smoke in the night.
119821010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119821010.evoFlair_: I have many aliases, but you're the one who's dug the deepest— Eek! Wh-what did I tell you about touching me when I'm not expecting it? Humph... naughty child!

119821020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Evolve this follower.
Strike: If Resonance is active for you, gain the ability to attack 2 times this turn.
119821020.baseFlair_: Look at this spin blade. Can you see the beauty and strength in its form? Haha, the rotations have captivated you, haven't they?
119821020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119821020.evoFlair_: The beauty is in what lies beyond the spin. Let me show you the exquisiteness embodied in the blades. Each one will stir up a breeze, until they kick up a whirlwind spin blade revolution!

120821020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard a card, then draw a card.
120821020.baseFlair_: Ta-da! Set your peepers on my fourth creation! You there, won't you be my guinea pi— I mean, my test subject? How else am I supposed to iron out the flaws?
120821020.evoFlair_:
The wings on your back are cumbersome? Then we'll find someone else to wear them! —Gizmo Enthusiast
Wait, are you implying that the problem is with me and not the wings? —Mech Wing Swordsman

715821010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard a card, then draw a card.
715821010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon an Ancient Artifact.

(This card will be treated as a Gizmo Enthusiast.)
715821010.evoFlair_:
Today, we feast. Eat up, Spirit of Fire!
—Hao

121821010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Once on each of your turns, when an allied Puppet comes into play, remove all its effects except changes to its attack or defense.
121821010.baseFlair_: Is a puppet's life in its beauty or its form? Its presence on stage or its heart? Please, get off that high horse of yours. We both know that it lies in something much more precarious. You already know the answer, don't you? After all, your life is hanging by a thread.
121821010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121821010.evoFlair_: A puppet's life exists outside of itself, so delicate and stretched so very thin. All it would take is one snip and snap—it's all over. So, now that the power to cut you from this mortal coil lies with me, perhaps you should start groveling.

121821020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If any other Machina cards are in your hand, gain +2/+0.
Last Words: Put an Assembly Droid and Repair Mode into your hand.
121821020.baseFlair_: When corporal punishment was mandated, I welcomed the law and order. When meal distribution was regulated, I lauded the fairness. When sleep was controlled, I admired the efficiency. —Etchings in Apt. 1008D, Sector B
121821020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121821020.evoFlair_: Then they gave us uniforms. Regulated the length of each step. Told us how to take off our shoes. When to relieve ourselves. Who we'd marry. Chose our names. But our speech was also monitored, so no one could utter a word in protest. —Etchings in Apt. 1008D, Sector B

122821010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Enhanced Puppet into your hand.
122821010.baseFlair_: I once envied the life of puppets. Born with everything they needed to know—nothing more, nothing less. I quickly changed my mind once I became a puppeteer myself.
122821010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Puppet and Enhanced Puppet into your hand.
122821010.evoFlair_: She hated herself. Cursed by the world to feel useless, her malice only grew. She created a puppet in her own image, putting her heart and soul into it. At last, she found peace in this version of herself with newfound purpose.

122821020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Analyzing Artifact into your hand.
122821020.baseFlair_: More than the pastures of green or depths of the sea, I was enamored by the sky beyond the clouds. They laughed at my lofty dreams of flying among the birds... but with these wings, I won't have to hear them any longer!
122821020.evoFlair_: The Icarus Model's working out great. Skies blue as usual, target confirmed, stand by for take-off... Those floating ruins are just begging to be explored! I can't wait to tell everyone back on the ground!

122821030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 6 different allied Artifact cards have been destroyed this match, gain +4/+4 and deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
122821030.baseFlair_: Why were ancient relics shaped like this? Was it a symbol of their faith? The archaeologists didn't realize the answer was quite simple—more than one arm is needed to steer dimensions.
122821030.evoFlair_: Somehow the ancient relic was once mistakenly activated, winning the war. The civilization of titans was forever lost—sealed to another dimension. The people hailed the relic for this miracle, unaware of its true purpose: to invade other dimensions.

123821010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Doll Operation or Puppet Room into your hand.
123821010.baseFlair_: I've got dwarven craftsmanship in my blood, sure, but that means nothin' without training and practice. You've gotta look at what others built and think about how they did it—and how you'd do better.
123821010.evoFlair_:
Gave the boy a defective model I had lyin' around, and not only did he get the dang thing workin', he's got it flying around my workshop! I oughta take a leaf outta his book.
—Magic Gunsmith

123821030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower and put a copy of it into your hand.
Fanfare: Destroy an allied Portalcraft amulet without Countdown and put a copy of it into your hand.
123821030.baseFlair_: We aren't worthy, so we must better ourselves for her! Cut out everything else from your life—it's only holding you back. Act like her, speak like her, destroy like her... Let her melody carry you to new heights!
123821030.evoFlair_: The Ten Omens were returned to the world on a tablet of sapphire stone. Carved into a new column was the next Trial of Destruction—Melody. Disciples once more destroyed their lives to support their idol.

124821020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, remove all effects on all enemy followers except changes to their attack or defense.
124821020.baseFlair_: This pistol is my prince, my one and only prince! At my beck and call, he charges at my foes at the speed of sound! Do you like this dress? Just look at us—two rounds in a chamber!
124821020.evoFlair_: I was once weak, with nothing to my name. But everything changed for me when my prince came to my rescue—not on a horse, but as pure, relentless steel.

125821010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Banish a card from your hand and put a copy of it into your deck. At the end of this turn, draw a card.
Whenever Resonance becomes active for you, restore 1 defense to all allies.
125821010.baseFlair_: Now that I've lost my wings, I can finally leave my cage! What a strange feeling... I guess this means Cassim and I can be together forever now! If I have him by my side, I don't need wings!
125821010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: If no allied Cassim, the Courageouses are in play, summon 1.
Whenever Resonance becomes active for you, restore 1 defense to all allies.
125821010.evoFlair_:
"Cassim! Quickly, over here!" "Watch out, Rosa!"
Thank you for being there for me...for protecting me. With you in my life, I feel like I can find the courage to forge ahead!

125821020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Banish a card from your hand and put a copy of it into your deck. At the end of this turn, draw a card.
Whenever Resonance becomes active for you, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
125821020.baseFlair_: Desperately wanting to protect her, I decided to get wings of my own. But it turns out that what I really needed all along was merely the courage to take her hand—and never let go. I don't need wings after all!
125821020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: If no allied Rosa, Unfettered Maidens are in play, summon 1.
Whenever Resonance becomes active for you, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
125821020.evoFlair_: Our paradise is gone, and with it my need to have wings. From here on out, we walk on our own. But if I have my sister with me, there's nowhere I can't go!

900821010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Radiant Artifact and a Prime Artifact into your deck.
900821010.baseFlair_: My life is synthetic, and so is my body. But this gentle heart of mine is real! I want to give you peace. I really do!
900821010.evoFlair_: Other people made my life and my body. But these gentle feelings are all my own. I can be a home for you. I really believe I can!

900821020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
900821020.baseFlair_: My life is synthetic, and so is my body. But this wild heart of mine is real! I want to be your power. I really do!
900821020.evoFlair_: Other people made my life and my body. But these wild feelings are all my own! I can be strong if it's for you. I really think I can!

109831010.baseFlair_: If the automatons we build outshine man on the battlefield, humanity's future has no glory. Mankind should flourish; anything less would be unromantic. However... there are those who have no potential. It will be amusing weeding them out.
109831010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put a Guardform Golem or Strikeform Golem into your hand.
109831010.evoFlair_: Humanity will forge its own future. That much is absolute fact, just as history tells us. However, there is no history devoid of sacrifice. As such, I shall activate them for the people who inhabit this world.

110831020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied Portalcraft followers the following effect - Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
110831020.baseFlair_: There must be more to life than victory. I truly believe that, which is why I want to put people's safety first. Even if that is a philosophy unbefitting a commander...
110831020.evoFlair_: I am no hero. I am truly nothing close. I think I'm only hiding from my own failings... as a commander and as a person. Silently hoping someone will notice... and give me the push I need to change.

112831010.baseFlair_: I've been waiting so long for the day I would meet you. I'll remember this moment forever... Now, come. We'll bring new order to this world.
112831010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Put a Chaos Awakens into your hand.
112831010.evoFlair_: We have to save absolutely everyone. How? Haha. You can leave that to me. Seriously, it'll be all right—I can embrace whatever I please... Now, come. It's time for the world to remember chaos.

113831030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, if you have at least 2 play points, use 2 play points to transform it into a Doll Slayer.
Last Words: Transform a random allied Doll Slayer into a Vier, Doll Slayer.
113831030.baseFlair_:
Well, aren't you good? Yes, very nice! Fine and great! Just excellent, yes!
I am Vier! We are ALTERNATIVE! Now show us, show us! Show us your strength, your resolve... your very worth!
113831030.evoFlair_:
Come on, show me! And the next me! And the next me, and the next me!
I am Vier! We are Vier! And we are one! Allow us to thank you right away by taking your life!

114831020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Remove all effects on all other followers except changes to their attack or defense.
114831020.baseFlair_: Yahoo! The impossibly cute Mugnier with a smile of gold, at your service! Now let's get out there and purge this world of filth!
114831020.evoFlair_: Yeah, lotsa people tell me I'm weird or messed up. But it doesn't bother me in the slightest! As long as I get to purge the filth that's all around us, everything's right as rain! Tee-hee!

115831010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, put a Puppet into your hand. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, give it +4/+0.
115831010.baseFlair_: One. The heart is the one essential component of the fist. Body? Technique? These things are trivial. Two. Be silent and reflect. Know yourself as you have come to be. —The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Heart
115831010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Recover 1 play point.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, put a Puppet into your hand. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, give it +4/+0.
115831010.evoFlair_: Three. Look at yourself. Look inside. All of Creation resides within you. Four. Only when you know your place within the cosmos, and its place within you, will you attain true mastery. —The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Heart

115831030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower Ward. Then, if it's evolved, give it +1/+1, draw a card, and recover 1 play point.
115831030.baseFlair_: Well done today. I'm sure you've forgotten me, so I'll introduce myself again. My name is Ameth. I'm on your side.
115831030.evoFlair_: It must be rough getting dragged into so many different messes, but don't forget you have your own story—make sure you're living it to the fullest. If you find yourself lost, I'll get you back on track.

117831020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Portalcraft followers from your deck into play. Activate its Fanfare effects (excluding Choose and targeted effects).
117831020.baseFlair_: How many years upon years has it been? It's my duty to thwart enemies as a protector to the Empyreal. Until the time my seal is released; until my dear friend comes to see me.
117831020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Give an ally the following effect - The next time this ally takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
117831020.evoFlair_: The Empyreal has awoken, and the long-awaited day has come. He is the chosen one, the one I must follow and protect if I'm ever to see the future's light.

119831010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, evolve this follower.
119831010.baseFlair_: Me, a monster artist? Well, you're not wrong. That's what everybody calls me, and that is how I earn a living. But... I... What I really want is... Ohhh, my evil eye is throbbing...!
119831010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Facsimile into your hand.
119831010.evoFlair_: I'm actually aiming to be a romantic storybook artist, you know. I want to create a world where beautiful knights and princes find love in each other's arms... Oh! Ohhh, Prince Popol, I feel a surge of inspiration coming on...!

122831020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Queen Hemera the White or Queen Magnus the Black into your hand. Then, if at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, subtract 2 from its cost.
122831020.baseFlair_: Black and White both wished for a fate of their own choosing. Their desires were so strong that they manifested my very being! Allow me to help you break free of the chains of fate, friends! I wanna see more than what this board has to offer too!
122831020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Subtract 2 from the costs of a random Queen Hemera the White and random Queen Magnus the Black in your hand.
122831020.evoFlair_:
Although we may be divided by color, our hearts beat the same.
—Queen Hemera the Brave
Hmph. Tread carefully, Rook.
—Queen Magnus the Graceful

123831010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, give -1/-1 to a random enemy follower. (Followers are destroyed when their defense drops below 1.)
123831010.baseFlair_: What should my next puppet be? Ooh, I know! Puppets are kinda like zombies, huh? They aren't alive, but they can move around... It's perfect! A zombie'll be super cute. I'll have to find some good references, though.
123831010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon an Enhanced Puppet.
Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, give -1/-1 to a random enemy follower.
123831010.evoFlair_:
"People try to make lifelike puppets, but I want to make mine undead-like. I try to give each of my pieces a soul—to animate the inanimate."
—Magazine Interview Snippet

125831010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, draw a card.
125831010.baseFlair_: I've been waiting for so long...for the key that opens me. A gate at the border of dimensions, in a place where time stands still, I wait, eternally... I can scarce believe such a day has come—to think that I would wish for the end...
125831010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a random Portalcraft follower that originally costs 2 play points or less (excluding Tylle, Dimension Observer) from your deck into play.
At the end of your turn, if Resonance is active for you, put a random Portalcraft follower that originally costs 1 play point or less from your deck into play.
125831010.evoFlair_: The grey landscape which I grew used to is no more... You have taken me by the hand and led me outside—and yet I remain intact, unbroken. I...wish to see what lies beyond for myself, to travel the world!

900831020.baseFlair_:
"Now, awaken. You will sacrifice your body to protect humanity, lest we never find glory."
—Paracelsus
900831020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900831020.evoFlair_:
"Automatons don't have minds of their own. But they do have my orders. Protect humanity, for we spill the beautiful blood and steel that will spread throughout this land."
—Paracelsus

900831030.baseFlair_:
"Now, awaken. You will weed out the dregs of humanity with your hands, lest they be allowed to continue in mediocrity."
—Paracelsus
900831030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900831030.evoFlair_:
"Automatons don't have minds of their own. But they do have my orders. Weed them out—those dregs who dare to defy my will."
—Paracelsus

900831040.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy. Do this 3 times.
900831040.baseFlair_: Loud noises and voices and stuff scare me... But I gotta be a stronger girl so Mom and Dad don't worry about me so much. Sigh... But how do you learn not to be a scaredy cat?
900831040.evoFlair_: Eeek! You scared me half to death! B-but I won't let anybody bother my friends! I'm gonna make you pay, you big meanie!

900831060.baseFlair_: What is the heart? What is its color, its shape, its taste? A man sought the answers to these questions maniacally, nay, pathologically. He created a doll with a heart—a human without a heart.
900831060.evoFlair_: Power comes from the heart—even a synthetic being could wield its potential. But ask yourself—are those without hearts without power? Let's find out together! Those with hearts, with strength, we'll hunt the dolls and see for ourselves! —ALTERNATIVE Voice File

109841020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Transform an enemy follower into a Lococo's Teddy Bear.
109841020.baseFlair_: People, animals, everybody's always looking at me. Their eyes are scary, I don't like them... Aren't button eyes cuter? Say, won't you become my puppet? Then you won't be scary anymore!
109841020.evoFlair_: Why is everyone so scary? Cute things are better! You know what, I'll make you into my puppet. That way you'll be cute... Cute forever and ever!

116841010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
When another allied Artifact card comes into play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
116841010.baseFlair_:
Thanks to the quick progress of technology, we were able to develop her cybernetic systems. She is swifter than sound and rivals light, far surpassing the limits of flesh and blood. Nothing, not one thing, can touch her.
—Abandoned Lab Note
116841010.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Evolve: If you have at least 6 play points, use 6 play points and gain Storm and +X/+X. X equals the number of different allied Artifact cards destroyed this match.
116841010.evoFlair_: See how the engine springs forth with a roar; watch how claws of energy leap into being. The master of this device is the most powerful life-form of all. She doesn't hesitate; she downs pulseless metal with a single blow. The struggle between speed and strength has begun.

714841010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
When another allied Artifact card comes into play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
714841010.baseFlair_:
Thanks to the quick progress of technology, we were able to develop her cybernetic systems. She is swifter than sound and rivals light, far surpassing the limits of flesh and blood. Nothing, not one thing, can touch her.
—Abandoned Lab Note
714841010.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Evolve: If you have at least 6 play points, use 6 play points and gain Storm and +X/+X. X equals the number of different allied Artifact cards destroyed this match.
714841010.evoFlair_: See how the engine springs forth with a roar; watch how claws of energy leap into being. The master of this device is the most powerful life-form of all. She doesn't hesitate; she downs pulseless metal with a single blow. The struggle between speed and strength has begun.

118841010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 4 defense, put a Wretched Tryst into your hand and banish this follower.
Last Words: Put an Illganeau, Horror Astray into your hand and give it +0/+X. X equals this follower's defense before being destroyed.
118841010.baseFlair_: They said I was a fiend... They said they'd send me back to hell, then they filled me with bullets. And when I rose from the dead, they didn't call it a miracle... but a curse. Tell me... just what am I?
118841010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give -1/-1 to all enemy followers. (Followers are destroyed when their defense drops below 1.)
Last Words: Put an Illganeau, Horror Astray into your hand and give it +0/+X. X equals this follower's defense before being destroyed.
118841010.evoFlair_: When I am shot, it hurts. But when those I love are killed... it feels like getting shot a thousand times over. Yet, you won't put down your weapon. Why? Is it because we look different from you, think different from you? Well, the way you think... it makes my blood run cold.

119841020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Until the end of your opponent's turn, give -4/-0 to a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
Skybound Art (10): Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 3 times.
Super Skybound Art (15): Give all allied followers the ability to attack 2 times per turn.
At the end of turns you are unable to evolve, return this card to your hand.
119841020.baseFlair_: What do you need to protect the things you love? The answer is simple: you just have to become the strongest—have the power to turn animosity, malice, and spite lethally back on your enemies. All those rotten scumbags need to do is fear my blades!
119841020.evoFlair_: I'm potty-mouthed? Yes, I get that a lot. But so what? It just means there aren't enough people worth showing respect. Sis, the children of Stardust Town, you, and the other Eternals... They're the only ones who've earned it, you see.

121841010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied followers destroyed this match.
121841010.baseFlair_: I was always in pain, always sad. But one day, my curiosity won out. So, this is how the upper classes felt when they trampled us. I understand completely. With Nerva's power, I've done the same to my world. Ah, how wonderful it feels to purge all that filth.
121841010.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Evolve: If you have at least 8 play points, gain +X/+0.
121841010.evoFlair_: The mIstrEAteD OnE CaLleD Out to me. HeR tEArs SumMoneD Me THuS. UntO her, VeSSelhOod WaS grAntEd. But MAIshA LaFOrge was a fOOl. UnwOrTHY of the kEEpeRS, UnwOrTHY EvEn as a vessel. An UnwOrTHY FoOl fILLeD wIth OvErweEnIng pRIde.

121841030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Banish a card in your hand and put a copy of it into your deck. Draw a card.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if Resonance has been activated for you at least 5 times this match, deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower. Then, if it has been activated at least 10 times, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
121841030.baseFlair_: I'm a broken vessel—a fool of a king who destroyed his own world. If judgment awaits, then I'll gladly submit to it at the end. Until then, I'll continue saving worlds and helping my comrades. Do you hear me, Nerva? The day of reckoning for both of us is close.
121841030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon an Analyzing Artifact.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if Resonance has been activated for you at least 5 times this match, deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower. Then, if it has been activated at least 10 times, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
121841030.evoFlair_: The bUrdEneD KiNG CaLleD Out to me. HiS bUrnIng RaGe SumMoneD Me THuS. UntO him, VeSSelhOod WaS grAntEd. But YuWaN GILfreI was a fOOl. So LoNg as tHou rAgE, thOu caNNot sAve aNYthiNg. AdMIt thy folly aNd BOw in gRIef.

123841010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If at least 6 different allied Artifact cards have been destroyed this match, deal 4 damage to all enemy followers.
123841010.baseFlair_: The Trial of Destruction isn't in my task list, and I can't worship you without an ID and authorization. You'll need admin clearan— Huh? You'll destroy me? Hah, I'd like to see you try! Catch me if you can!
123841010.evoFlair_: I realized it's better to run with the melody than from it. Music actually pushes me forward—faster! System update complete, core functions optimized! I'm swifter than sound, and now, swifter than light! Wheee!

900841090.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, put a Puppet into your opponent's hand.
900841090.baseFlair_: Dragons are scary, but I'm not scared! Because I have friends... You're all my friends now! —Lococo, Little Puppeteer
900841090.evoFlair_: Dragons are scary, but button eyes are cute! That's why my friends... We're friends forever. —Lococo, Little Puppeteer

100814010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
If Resonance is active for you, deal 5 damage instead.

705814010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
If Resonance is active for you, deal 5 damage instead.
705814010.baseFlair_: The steel warrior activates her anti-repulsion field and takes to the skies. She fights to protect the smiles of the innocent. She fights to defeat the evils of this world. Now, go, unleash your ultimate technique: Hyper Megaton Kick!

108814010.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and deal 6 damage instead.
108814010.baseFlair_: Whooooa there! Enough tinkering with stuff that don't need tinkering! —Mechanical Soldier

110814010.baseEffect_:
Put a Puppet into your hand.
If Resonance is active for you, put 2 into your hand instead.
110814010.baseFlair_: Someday there might be a puppet who can wind up another puppet. Then they won't need people no more. —Young Artisan

121814010.baseEffect_:
Recover 1 evolution point.
Then, if at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, draw 2 cards.
121814010.baseFlair_:
It all began with Purgation. The world was a slate wiped clean of impurity, but the girl felt an emptiness inside that had nothing to do with the loss of her home.
"Oh, Nerva. Please, come to me again. I long for you..."
—Tales from Isunia, Entry 1

123814010.baseEffect_:
Summon an Analyzing Artifact.
If you've played any other Inner Discoveries this match, give it Rush.
123814010.baseFlair_: Innovation is merely the creative application of existing technologies.

717814010.baseEffect_:
Summon an Analyzing Artifact.
If you've played any other Inner Discoveries this match, give it Rush.
717814010.baseFlair_:
Switching system settings to the overclocking preset...
Preset loaded. Unit: Mihono Bourbon, ready to launch!

126814010.baseEffect_:
Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
Rally (10): Give them Last Words - Put a Puppet into your hand.
126814010.baseFlair_: They move in sync, not a thread out of place.

118824010.baseEffect_: Put 1 random copy each of allied followers destroyed this match that cost 1, 3, 5, 7, and 9 play points into your hand.
118824010.baseFlair_: One person's trash is another person's treasure—an adage that's oh-so-true for puppeteers.

900824020.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
If at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, deal 3 damage to any enemy instead.
900824020.baseFlair_: Let me brand reality onto you. The moon's pale truth will always be outshone by the sun's lies. Those who try to expose the filth roiling beneath the land of shimmering dew and guilds will be pulled under. That is why I shall burn it all away with the power of Purgation.

114834010.baseEffect_: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, put 2 Artifact cards instead.
114834010.baseFlair_: Command me, and I shall carry out the order. I make no distinction between feasible and infeasible.

709834020.baseEffect_: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, put 2 Artifact cards instead.
709834020.baseFlair_:
All members of the SOS Brigade, assemble!
—Haruhi Suzumiya

122834010.baseEffect_:
If 5 or less different allied Artifact cards have been destroyed this match, summon an Ancient Artifact.
Otherwise, deal 6 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 6 damage to the enemy leader instead.
122834010.baseFlair_: Finally broke on me, have you? What a pain in the neck... Welp, at least there's some loot in it for me.

114844010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
Enhance (9): Choose - Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Vesha, Herald of Ravage
-Izalue, Herald of Death
-Jotet, Herald of Despair
114844010.baseFlair_:
Three divine beings created to destroy, kill, and eradicate. The innocence so evident in their sleeping faces seems to mock the world's fragility. Or perhaps it is a mercy granted to them.
—Beings of Antiquity, in faded writing in the margins

900822010.baseEffect_:
Can't be destroyed by effects.
At the end of your turn, if your leader has 10 defense or less, restore 3 defense to your leader and banish this amulet.
900822010.baseFlair_: I call it the Bright-Skies-and-No-Clouds-In-Sight Bot!

126832010.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
-Increase your leader's maximum defense by 1 and restore 1 defense to your leader.
-Put a random Portalcraft follower from your deck into your hand.
If you have more evolution points than your opponent, activate all 3 instead. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
126832010.baseFlair_:
"We must not lose the Arc. That object... the Arc... is the embodiment of humanity's hope!"
—Marguerite

100811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
100811010.baseFlair_: Welcome to the city of hopes and dreams—where dolls and humans live in harmony! I just love it when they smile. Enjoy to your heart's content!
100811010.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, give it +1/+0.
100811010.evoFlair_: Welcome to the city of nightmares and despair—where time for humans has run out! I just love it when they scream. Let me enjoy it to my heart's content!

100811030.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
100811030.baseFlair_: Whoa there! Hey, tough guy! Just wait 'til my comrades get here—I bet you won't be feelin' so tough then, will ya?
100811030.evoFlair_: A tenacious one, aren't ya? You've left me no choice—I'm going in alone! My comrades will be here in no time to finish you off. Chaaarge!

107811050.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put 2 Ancient Artifacts into your deck.
107811050.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
