107811050.evoFlair_: Meow-ow-ow! Ready to blast 'em off, right meow!

107811060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. If there are no enemy followers in play, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader instead.
107811060.baseFlair_: This fella right here ain't much of a looker, but it'll smash ya real good!
107811060.evoFlair_: Seriously, this fella can't be stopped! Well, maybe it can—who knows? For now though, I'll smash everything to bits while I can!

107811070.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put 2 Mystic Artifacts into your deck.
107811070.baseFlair_: Even without Mysteria's blessing, I can still fight—as long as I have this!
107811070.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107811070.evoFlair_: Who needs magic when you have technology? Come on—don't break on me now!

107811140.baseFlair_: I'd say the fellas making these artifacts and whatnot are pretty strange, but whoever made this one was truly mad as a hatter. —A Mercenary
107811140.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: If Resonance is active for you, remove all effects on this follower except changes to its attack or defense.
Can't attack.
107811140.evoFlair_: I mean, staying cooped up by yourself for so long can't be good for you, right? Explains why they're not all there, at least. It wouldn't hurt to ask for some help, would it? —A Mercenary

108811030.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
108811030.baseFlair_: What is the heart? What is its color, its shape, its taste? A man sought the answers to these questions maniacally, nay, pathologically. This is what he created.
108811030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108811030.evoFlair_: It has no heart and no reason, which garnered it the name of Junk. Junk crawls through the night, led on by the plaintive laughter.

109811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied Portalcraft follower. If that follower can be targeted by enemy effects, your opponent can only target that follower.
109811010.baseFlair_: Excuse me. Do you know where my little brother might have gone? His name is Ayer.
109811010.evoFlair_: He was kidnapped by a primal beast several years ago. But I believe he's out there somewhere, alive and well!

110811030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown, and then deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
110811030.baseFlair_: Destroy, destroy, destroy. Doesn't matter if it exists or not, burn it until not even the concept remains. Destruction is evidence of freedom—burn to the rhythm, dance to the damage!
110811030.evoFlair_:
The First Order: Suffer No Chains
Prohibit nothing. Admonish no one. Know how useless you are to this world.
—The Teachings of Team Destruction

111811030.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, give it +0/+2.
111811030.baseFlair_: Welcome to the city of hopes and dreams! This is a place where humans and puppets can live together in harmony. Hope you enjoy your stay here. We'll do anything to make you more comfortable.
111811030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, give it +0/+2.
111811030.evoFlair_: I'm a mother to all these puppets. How dare you try to bring harm to them—looks like we'll need to teach you some manners. Stephanie! Chew on 'em!

112811020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Evolve this follower.
Can't be attacked.
112811020.baseFlair_: Eh, that little pile of pudding isn't nearly as menacing as other monsters—just look how stupid its tiny face is. That's why I haven't bothered to fight it. And besides, I don't want to get any of its juice on me. —Interview with a Warrior
112811020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112811020.evoFlair_: This particular monster has proven quite beneficial for the research community. Neither the finest warriors nor monsters try to come near its goo. It defends against enemies while being completely harmless itself. How astonishing. —Overheard from a Researcher

115811020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, summon an Analyzing Artifact. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, summon a Mystic Artifact.
115811020.baseFlair_: One. The fist's form has its foundation in the body. The body is the root from which the fist grows. Two. One must cultivate the body to hone the fist. Devote yourself to its training. —The Ultimate Way of the Fist, Body
115811020.evoFlair_: Three. Venture to the brink of your body's capabilities and gaze into the abyss. Do not hesitate. Four. Build sinew. Wreathe yourself in scar tissue. Know your training will never be complete. —The Ultimate Way of the Fist, Body

116811020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Summon an Analyzing Artifact or Ancient Artifact.
116811020.baseFlair_: Some folks ain't good with magic. Don't have enough mana in them or whatever. So I make these here magic weapons for them. Take a look at this beaut. She's a magic gun—a real sweetheart, plays nice with anyone.
116811020.evoFlair_: So magic and magic weapons are kinda similar—can't use either if you don't have the guts. Look, if you're not sure about what you're doing with a gun, that's gonna tell on your aim.

116811030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put an Assembly Droid and Repair Mode into your hand.
116811030.baseFlair_:
Concept: Unification of shell and steel
Subjects: All organisms who make heavy use of shells
Mission: Development of an impenetrable substance
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team Y
116811030.evoFlair_:
Beasts were used as test subjects and made into steel amalgamations. Detractors claimed the researchers were exploiting the animals. But that could not be further from the truth. The beasts were exploiting the tech.
—In Defense of Machines, Part 1

117811030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of different allied Artifact cards destroyed this match.
117811030.baseFlair_:
Today we finally head into the ruins! They call it a tiger's den, but hey! Nothing ventured, nothing gained! Just gotta be careful not to step on its tail.
—A Recovered Research Log
117811030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117811030.evoFlair_:
We weren't walking into a tiger's den; it was the tiger's maw itself. What we discovered wasn't a relic; it was the tiger's tail.
—A Half-Shredded Research Log

118811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the cost of an Artifact card or Paradigm Shift in your hand.
118811010.baseFlair_: You can't see the string, can you? I call it Stealth Yo-yo—a fun little trick I just happen to know. People see these things as children's toys, but if you know what you're doing, they can be so much more.
118811010.evoFlair_: Toys are never just toys. Take the time to tinker with 'em and really figure 'em out, and you open up a whole new world. 'Course there's always room for improvement; that's why I never rest on my laurels. Check out my ultimate technique: Beam Nest!

119811020.baseEffect_: Once on each of your opponent's turns, when they play a card, put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
119811020.baseFlair_: The moment you set foot inside the ruins, the traps start to activate. Each is unique and targets a different part of you. Before long, the final trap that takes your life is sprung. But little did you know, the first trap was laid long before you even entered the ruins.
119811020.evoFlair_: The surveillance system analyzes your weaknesses—the condition of your tools and armor, the vulnerabilities that make you tick. Then it's only a matter of time before it extracts the data that makes you who you are, leaving you an empty shell.

119811040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
119811040.baseFlair_: Just a little more... I'm so close, I can feel it! I'll never make any real progress as I am now. I have to change... to get out of my comfort zone and put myself out there. Not just for my sake, but for hers, too!
119811040.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give a random Puppet in your hand the following effect - Fanfare: Evolve this follower.
119811040.evoFlair_: I'm starting to understand... Just as these strings connect the performer to the puppet, so too can our art bring people together. Is this what my old teacher was trying to tell me? Either way, I think we can really have some fun now!

122811010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a copy of the left-most card in your hand into your hand.
122811010.baseFlair_: A life confined within a tiny capsule. You may think it pathetic, even laughable. Go ahead and laugh all you want, but I'm much too busy with my research to humor you right now.
122811010.evoFlair_: Humans sure have it nice, spending time outside like that... I've got my hands full handling things inside as it is, you know? Here, look for yourself—inside this capsule is pure knowledge.

125811020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare and Last Words: Put an Analyzing Artifact into your deck.
125811020.baseFlair_: No matter what kind of hot water you get yourself in; don't give up! Roll up your sleeves and get to it. Before you know it, the solution will pop into your head! That's how humans work—trust me, I'm very familiar with the phenomenon. That's how I got all my ideas!
125811020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
125811020.evoFlair_: At the exact moment you feel the urge to give up, double down and start wracking your brain! Nothing worth inventing was ever made without breaking a sweat. Adversity breeds innovation!

900811020.baseFlair_: It was created to protect—the motherly master, the fatherly apparatus, producers of life.
900811020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900811020.evoFlair_: It was created to protect until the very end. For mother and father—it risks peril in the name of duty.

900811070.baseFlair_: It was created to multiply—the burgeoning master, the subservient self, it becomes its own liege.
900811070.evoFlair_: It was created to multiply until the very end. Masterless it flourishes, covering the world in its image in due course.

107821040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
107821040.baseFlair_: Weapons? I've got 'em in all shapes and sizes. How about this one? My finest apprentice made it—you've never seen a blade this sharp! Not interested? Wait, there's more!
107821040.evoFlair_: They just don't get it, do they? Well, no matter. I'll just have to convince 'em myself... Who's ready for a demonstration—up close and personal?

111821020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Analyzing Artifact and an Ancient Artifact into your deck.
111821020.baseFlair_: Vroooom, skrrrrt! As long as I have this sweet ride, I can fly anywhere in the world—and learn all of its secrets. Yours are no exception of course.
111821020.evoFlair_: Vr-vr-vroooooom! Ah, I love this ride. Faster than a pegasus and far easier to control. Just don't tell the gods I took it, okay? They wouldn't be very happy if they found out!

114821020.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Whenever Resonance becomes active for you, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
114821020.baseFlair_: I'm defective... I can't go out in the sun, so I can't let go of my umbrella. Ah, how nice it'd be to see more of the world someday...
114821020.evoFlair_: Is it my fault I'm defective? That's just who I am. How I wish I could show my gratitude to everyone who's ever believed in me. Ah, look at how beautiful the sun is. I never knew...

115821020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal X damage to all enemy followers, then remove this effect. X equals your remaining play points.
115821020.baseFlair_:
One. Technique is also a trap. Use the entire body, as its structure indicates. Two. Body. Technique. Training, changing, shifting. This is not the true nature of the fist.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Technique
115821020.evoFlair_:
Three. Do techniques performed clothed in steel render the naked fist obsolete? No. Four. The heart is the most difficult organ to understand. The greatest wall to surmount resides within you.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Technique

120821010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain +2/+2 and Rush. Otherwise, summon a Puppet and evolve it.
120821010.baseFlair_: Forgive me. Neither my daughter nor I are good at faking smiles, you see. Oho... You think she looks like a doll? Well, you're not wrong. She may not have blood running through her veins, but as long as I have will enough for the both of us, that's all we need.
120821010.evoFlair_: Do you find the idea of an old man creating a puppet that looks like his daughter funny? Unfortunately, I cannot laugh with you. The only time I can truly laugh is once I've avenged myself upon you lot for murdering my family.

108831020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Blade of Light or Blade of Dark into your hand.
108831020.baseFlair_: I am there in the gaps. The one who wanders between white and black. Now that you have arrived, you must choose. Which color will it be? Your decision will change the world.
108831020.evoFlair_: I see. A very fine decision. Go forth and be proud of your choice. I bless your travel path from somewhere in the middle of the colors.

109831020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Summon a Camieux, Gunpowder Gal.
Follower Strike: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower.
109831020.baseFlair_: I'm sure we met for some reason or another. So just let ol' Cucouroux here give your firearm the overhaul it deserves!
109831020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
109831020.evoFlair_: Whenever you're sad, you can cry on ol' Cucouroux's shoulder! But, um, I think I know what you're thinking—my sisters, Silva and Camieux, would be much more comfortable to lean on. That makes me wanna cry too!

111831030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Can't attack the enemy leader.
111831030.baseFlair_: Countersolari and Isunia are both trifling matters. I merely wish to be chosen by her. It's what I planned for, what I've realized to be important. Oh, to finally become a hero.
111831030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Purgation's Blade into your hand.
(Can attack the enemy leader.)
111831030.evoFlair_: My world betrayed me. It was unsalvageable. Contaminated. That's why I was happy to see it fall to Purgation. And that's why I want to be chosen by her once more. I'll see Isunia burn for her attention.

112831020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
112831020.baseFlair_: If the world were a giant puppet show, oh how perfect it would be. Puppets, you see, they know their roles. You there, care to find out your role?
112831020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put 30 Puppets into your deck. Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, draw a card. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
112831020.evoFlair_: If the world is a stage, then the plays it hosts shouldn't be limited to human experience. I will be the director for this new theater, and I won't stand for any criticism from the audience. You there, ready yourself—for the real show is about to begin!

121831010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any other Machina cards are in your hand, draw a card.
At the end of your turn, if at least 3 Machina cards are in your hand, recover 1 evolution point.
121831010.baseFlair_: Critical error found in thought-processing systems. Emotional capacity: confirmed. Warning: all unauthorized units are subject to termination. Warning: all unauthorized—my friends—subject to termination. Warning: all unauthorized units— Why... am I doing this?
121831010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, if at least 3 Machina cards are in your hand, recover 1 evolution point.
121831010.evoFlair_: Initiating self-diagnostic deep circuit scan. Potential for emotional capacity confirmed. Defragmenting. Deleting all files with critical errors. Commencing scan of neural circuitry. All functions are within acceptable parameters. Recommencing termination protocol—

122831010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet and Enhanced Puppet into your hand. If at least 20 allied followers have been destroyed this match, give +1/+0 and Storm to all Puppets in your hand.
122831010.baseFlair_: Man created puppets in their own image—surely there is significance to be found there. An unmistakable truth that cannot be taken away. So rise, and fulfill your purpose in this life!
122831010.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
122831010.evoFlair_: There is no fate worse than a life without fulfilling one's purpose. Even if you break one thousand times, press onward! Only through a life grounded in labor may one taste glory in death.

124831010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any allied Puppets are in play, destroy 1 and draw 2 cards.
124831010.baseFlair_:
Its recoil often serves as a solemn reminder to the wielder. A reminder that one pull of the trigger is indeed capable of ending a life.
—How to Use Enchanted Pistols, Introduction
124831010.evoFlair_:
Its weight often serves as a solemn reminder to the wielder. A reminder that the consequences of pulling the trigger are permanent.
—How to Use Enchanted Pistols, Introduction

900831010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower. X equals this follower's attack.
900831010.baseFlair_: A rhapsody plays. Following the tune of their maestro's fingers, the puppets dance and scoff at the world.
900831010.evoFlair_: Break, rend, kill! Following their maestro's orders, the puppets squeak into action and rob the world.

109841030.baseEffect_:
Whenever Resonance becomes active for you, gain +2/+2.
Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemies if this follower has at least 10 attack.
109841030.baseFlair_: We fled in droves, as it burned everything within sight. Let it all die, eye of destruction. The transgressions of man are burned forever in its sight. Eradicate it all, eye of destruction.
109841030.evoFlair_: Eyesores. Burn them all, eye of destruction. Persecution for persecution, an eye for an eye. Transgression for transgression, by the full force of the all-seeing iconoclast.

115841010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +1/+1 and the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, gain +1/+1. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, destroy a random enemy follower.
115841010.baseFlair_: Once I was but meat and bone, imperfect. I traded flesh for armor plating. Training built my bones. Old and new were united by the will to fight, and in that moment I saw the world contained within me. I am, therefore, the best of all possible worlds.
115841010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Recover 3 play points.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, gain +1/+1. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, destroy a random enemy follower.
115841010.evoFlair_: Life and death. Joy and sorrow. So many opposing pairs to be weighed on the scales. Once perfected, linked with the world, I understood. Order and balance have been achieved, and the world is as it should be. I am, therefore the best of all possible worlds.

117841010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, summon an enemy Wheel of Misfortune and banish this follower.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if Resonance is active for you, gain +1/+1 and destroy a random enemy follower.
117841010.baseFlair_: Go on, give me your best shot, O lord. I'm the Wheel of Fortune, mascot of good luck. I bet I can wow you with something cool. First tell me your wish, and presto!
117841010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117841010.evoFlair_: Got it? When luck's on your side, only great things are in store! At least, that's what I think. Um, you see, I still have to figure out what'll truly make you happy. So step on up, spin the wheel, and tell me what you want again and again...

119841010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Skybound Art (10): Gain +2/+0 and Storm.
Super Skybound Art (15): Give Storm to all followers in your hand.
At the end of turns you are unable to evolve, return this card to your hand.
119841010.baseFlair_: There are things I want to protect. But... doing that means taking away the things someone else is trying to protect. Each action links with the next in a chain of unending sorrow. Still... I think someone has to break the chain.
119841010.evoFlair_: If I can become the last link in the chain of rancor and hatred... That's what I hope for. Feower, our little brothers and sisters, and the other Eternals... I'm sure they'll build a brighter future for everyone.

124841020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Analyzing Artifact into your hand.
124841020.baseFlair_: There won't be any tragedies on my watch. I may not be able to create a masterpiece, but at least it'll have a happy ending. For if I, the gears of salvation, cannot save everything... my existence is meaningless.
124841020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - During your turn, whenever an allied Artifact card comes into play, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
124841020.evoFlair_: There won't be any tragedies on my watch. I wished beyond anything to protect—at any cost. Thus, I've given up my powerless form and taken a new one. And I've made it my mission to provide all with a happy ending.

126841010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Burial Rite - Summon a Keenedge Artifact.
At the end of your turn, if at least 6 different allied Artifact cards have been destroyed this match, give +1/+1 and Ward to all allied Artifact followers.
126841010.baseFlair_: People and artifacts speak their own languages. I was made to bridge the gap, so the two sides could understand each other. But that doesn't matter! I may be a kid, but that doesn't mean I have to listen to my parents!
126841010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
126841010.evoFlair_: Someone made people too, right? But do they listen to their creators? Nope! That means you artifacts aren't bound to your creator's will. Here, I'll show you by example! Just do—or don't do—what I do! Once I set my mind to something, I do it right away!

900841040.baseEffect_:
Ward.
If this follower can be targeted by enemy effects, your opponent can only target this follower.
900841040.baseFlair_: A nocturne plays. Following their maestro's fingers, the puppets dance and defend the world.
900841040.evoFlair_: Caring, faith, and love. To protect their maestro through and through, the puppets squeak and race across the world.

900841190.baseEffect_:
When this follower comes into play, if at least 6 different allied Artifact cards have been destroyed this match, evolve this follower.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
900841190.baseFlair_: Doom encroaches on the two sisters. As their antiquated servants start to break, the younger of the fabricated sisters gathers her courage and speaks from the heart. Miraculously, the cogs begin to turn.
900841190.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 6 damage to all enemy followers, then remove this effect.
900841190.evoFlair_: The girls grip each other's hands tightly. Their newfound bonds become their power, and the machine of destruction awakens. It produces a dazzling brilliance, an ancient power that annihilates the invaders.

113814010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Puppet into your hand.
113814010.baseFlair_:
"This is my stage, where I play my part!"
The puppet speaks with pride as the puppeteer grins.
"Yes, yes, very good. But your role is already over."

120814010.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
At the start of your next 2 turns, draw a card.
120814010.baseFlair_:
Ah, the experiment failed? That's wonderful. I'd personally be terrified of relying on a system that hasn't had its kinks worked out.
—Senior Lab Director

107824010.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower with 3 defense or less.
Put a Puppet into your hand.
107824010.baseFlair_: A name is all one has in the end, so that's what you'll take. —Words of a Puppeteer

119824010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower and then 2 damage to another random enemy follower.
If you have more evolution points than your opponent, summon 2 Ancient Artifacts. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
119824010.baseFlair_:
"Meow-reow! Anyone who disturbs a kitty's catnap..."
"Gets a taste of our kitty-cat arsenal!"
—Cat Cannoneer and Cat Gunner

124824010.baseEffect_:
Summon an Ancient Artifact and Analyzing Artifact.
Then, if you have more evolution points than your opponent, summon a Mystic Artifact. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
124824010.baseFlair_: There is no reasoning with them, for this is all they know.

117834010.baseEffect_:
Put a Puppet into your hand.
Give your leader the following effect until the end of the turn: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader instead. (This effect is not stackable.)
117834010.baseFlair_: Humans think they control their own destiny. They think wrong.

121834010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Enhance (7): Summon an Armored Tentacle and Assault Tentacle. Put a random Machina follower from your deck into your hand.
121834010.baseFlair_: Emotions? Why would anyone believe in something so utterly absurd? They're all lies—you may as well believe in the tooth fairy! Give it up, already—we both know that there is no hope, no tomorrow, no future for any of you worms! —Tales from Naterra, Entry 6

125844010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon 1 of the following cards.
-Spear of Judgment
-Shield of Transgression
-Eternal Dogma
Enhance (5): Then, summon a Divine Treasure Herald.
Enhance (7): Then, summon a Divine Treasure Guardian.
125844010.baseFlair_: A vessel has no need for a soul—there is no need for even sentience. A puppet, devoid of spirit, is the perfect candidate for a divine vessel.

900844080.baseEffect_:

-Eternal Dogma
900844080.baseFlair_: A vessel has no need for a soul—there is no need for even sentience. A puppet, devoid of spirit, is the perfect candidate for a divine vessel.

900844010.baseEffect_: Give +2/+2 to all allied Machina followers.
900844010.baseFlair_: The light of the silverbeast lord reverberates even in the hearts of machines with little courage.

107813010.baseEffect_:

Last Words: Draw 2 cards. If Resonance is active for you, draw 1 card instead.
107813010.baseFlair_: Wisdom keeps the universe in motion.

107813020.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)

112822010.baseFlair_: To the forest, the battlefield, the sea, the workshop, the graveyard, the castle, and the church. It sent a piece of itself flying in seven different directions, ushering in seven different revolutions.

709822010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, put 2 Analyzing Artifacts, 2 Ancient Artifacts, and 2 Bifurcating Artifacts into your deck, recover 2 play points, then banish this amulet.

115823010.baseEffect_:

115823010.baseFlair_:
Button eyes, fluffy paws.
You all live here, now.
—Lococo, Little Puppeteer

900823010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Last Words: Summon a Robomi, Steel Warrior.
900823010.baseFlair_: Although the steel warrior's body is devoid of warmth, the fire of justice burns within her. She fights to protect the future and the innocent smiles of children. Only she and her engineer, Nicholas, can fight back the menace that threatens the skies.

900843010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the start of your turn, randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Add 1 to the cost of all cards in your hand until the end of the turn.
-Give -2/-2 to all allied followers.
-Summon an enemy Analyzing Artifact.

900843010.baseFlair_: See what happened? That's how it goes! There are two sides to the coin, and your bad luck spilled on everyone else. Sweet, sweet, disaster! But that means you reap the good stuff! Are you happy, O lord? No? Well, let's take another spin.

900843020.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader.
900843020.baseFlair_: A hollow vessel which thrusts the static world into disorder. This spear controls the mind of the person it possesses, robbing them of any and all freedom.

900843030.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
While this amulet is in play, your leader has the following effect: Can't take more than 4 damage at a time.
900843030.baseFlair_: A hollow vessel which thrusts the static world into disorder. This shield grants the wishes of the person it possesses, granting them prolonged life.

900843040.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader and draw a card.
900843040.baseFlair_: A hollow vessel which thrusts the static world into disorder. These words of despair nest deep in the heart of the person it possesses, warping their mind.

100811040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Radiant Artifacts into your deck.
100811040.baseFlair_: The biggest casualty of war is human life—fitting for the cheapest piece to fall in the greatest numbers. —Mechanical Doll Essentials, Prologue
100811040.evoFlair_: Mechanical Dolls have far surpassed the limits of man. Easy to operate, they can destroy without being destroyed. —Mechanical Doll Essentials, Chapter 1

107811010.baseFlair_: My arrows will always find their target. Sometimes they're sharp, sometimes they're dull—whatever is necessary to hit the mark.
107811010.evoEffect_: Evolve: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
107811010.evoFlair_: My arrows are always ready. Sometimes they're rigid, sometimes they're limber—whatever is necessary to pierce the target.

107811030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Analyzing Artifact, Ancient Artifact, Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact.
107811030.baseFlair_: Backup has arrived—initiating gravitational control protocol.
107811030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
107811030.evoFlair_: Hostiles still present—raising power levels to maximum.

108811020.baseEffect_: Clash: Put a Puppet into your hand.
108811020.baseFlair_: Life is so sticky and repulsive. I'm not sure whether you quite comprehend this aesthetic of mine. So I'm about to help you understand.
108811020.evoFlair_: True beauty is as smooth as porcelain. Ah, don't worry whether you understand though. You aren't necessary to begin with!

113811020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select a follower in your hand that originally costs 3 play points or less, and put a copy of that follower into your hand.
113811020.baseFlair_: I don't know where I am. I don't know who anyone is. If something happened, I wouldn't know about it. I don't know what this sound is supposed to be. All I know is I must keep on going and going and going... I cannot stop. I mustn't stop. —A Dead-eyed Citizen
113811020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Select a follower in your hand that originally costs 3 play points or less, and put a copy of that follower into your hand.
113811020.evoFlair_: "We'll traverse a cave! We'll cross a river! There's no end to this march... So let's keep on going and follow the path, wherever it goes!" —Hamelin

118811030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Summon a Bullet Bike.
118811030.baseFlair_:
Quick enough to bypass the threat of wandering Wretches, magitrains propel the hopes of desperate riders across the desolate wasteland. Their development is key in the settling of new frontiers.
—Magitrains for Nimwits, Page 1
118811030.evoFlair_:
Where did you come from? And where are you going? If you want to travel across the land—and avoid death by wretched claws in the process—there's only one method of transport for you: the magitrain.
—Magitrains for Nimwits, Page 2

121811030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Summon an Automaton Knight.
121811030.baseFlair_: Our strength lies in numbers! But numbers alone aren't gonna win battles! Ya need someone to do the groundwork! Leave it to me—my all-terrain treads will clear the way to victory! Chaaarge!
121811030.evoFlair_: Only automatons that have proved themselves are outfitted with tank functionality! The dust kicked up by their treads and the roar of their engines as they steer us to victory fill me with courage! Who doesn't want to be like them? —Automaton Knight

123811030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
Last Words: Draw 2 cards.
123811030.baseFlair_: The highest precision comes only with the finest tuning. To prevent malfunctions, the machine needs another machine to monitor its synchronization and internal temperature.
123811030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
123811030.evoFlair_: The finest tuning comes only with the highest precision. To prevent attunement errors, the machine's monitoring machine also needs another machine to monitor it, which also needs a machine that also has monitoring capability.

100821020.baseFlair_: A celestial unsuited for the underworld below, and a demonic wing unsuited for the heavens above—an outcast, bound to the earth between.
100821020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower if Resonance is active for you.
100821020.evoFlair_: Too pure to be a demon, and too corrupted to be an angel. Torn between heaven and hell, wield your power—in the name of the outcast.

112821020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Acceleratium into your hand. Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
112821020.baseFlair_: The second change led to optimization. The machines began to take the forms their handlers wanted. At the heart of this revolution were robots most peculiar. —Robot Research Log, Part 3
112821020.evoFlair_: It's strange. Where did the robots that helped us to optimize our technology come from? It's certainly not a man-made machine. Nor is it one of the changes brought by the core. When the hell did it manifest into our plane? —Researcher's Reflections, Part 3

113821020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random non-Artifact card that costs 1 play point or less from your deck into your hand.
113821020.baseFlair_:
"Yup! Once the final product's ready, I'll be able to fly as far as the sun!"
—Icarus, Sunbound Wing
"W-wait, you're telling me this is just a prototype?!"
—Mech Wing Swordsman
113821020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Artifact follower that costs 1 play point or less from your deck into play.
113821020.evoFlair_:
"Once I finish the final design, you can have this one too!"
—Icarus, Sunbound Wing
"You're just giving me your hand-me-downs?!"
—Mech Wing Swordsman

114821010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain +1/+1.
114821010.baseFlair_:
Concept: Overall increase in physical performance.
Subjects: Large, ferocious beasts.
Mission: Capture illegal poachers.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team B
114821010.evoFlair_: The stakeout against the poachers proceeded smoothly; the problem lay in the bond between man and beast. They were unwilling to part at the very end. We must take measures to prevent a recurrence. For the good of all of us.

117821020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all Puppets in your hand.
117821020.baseFlair_: What up, civilization! These biceps are gonna usher in a new age! No way these huge guns are going to waste!
117821020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117821020.evoFlair_: You could carry the whole friggin' world on those massive sculpted traps! It's like Fearsome Fortress has been reincarnated!

123821020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and then the enemy leader. Do this 1 time. If at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, do this 2 times instead.
123821020.baseFlair_:
"Whew, finally figured out how to make you light and sturdy, drafted up plans for your laser cannon, and most importantly... the little toy birdie eyes I had made to order just came in the mail!" "Toy... birdie eyes?"
—Mechanic and the Hawk
123821020.evoFlair_:
"You oiled my wings?" "Yep! All good to go!"
"Is the charging port in my beak done?" "Mm-hm!"
"Now can you fix—" "Nope! The birdie eyes are staying! D'awwww, they're so cute!"
—Hawk and the Mechanic

125821030.baseFlair_: There's nothing worse than being tied down by rigid conventions. If you want to produce ground-breaking research, you need to let loose, relax, and be flexible. You get the best results when you think outside the box!
125821030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Evolve a random unevolved allied Creeping Slime.
125821030.evoFlair_: In research, molds exist to be broken! Nothing has to be a certain way—everything is in flux. Not tying yourself to existing forms will make you stand out even more! Gosh, it's so much more exciting to work without blueprints!

107831030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader. If Resonance is active for you, recover 1 play point.
107831030.baseFlair_: Ever rotating as preordained, a cog of silver. Give it a spin for yourself, and restore order to the convolutions of time and space.
107831030.evoFlair_: A cog of purpose, a cog of power—these two cogs ever turning, moving humanity forward. Escape the cycle, and spin the cog of silver for yourself.

107831050.baseFlair_: The mind—so fragile, so susceptible. Let me relieve you of control.
107831050.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish an enemy follower that costs 2 play points or less and then summon a copy of that follower as an allied follower.
107831050.evoFlair_: The idea of free will is but a fantasy, so come closer. Now, let's see it then! Kneel before your new master.

110831010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown. Put a copy of that card into your hand and subtract 3 from its cost.
110831010.baseFlair_: Destroy, destroy, destroy. Destroy all curiosity. There is no future without destruction—smile for Armageddon, dance to the damage!
110831010.evoFlair_:
The Third Order: Believe
There is no escape from destruction. When she dances, when she sings, it's her performance that heralds destruction.
—The Teachings of Team Destruction

111831010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
111831010.baseFlair_: You understand it, don't you? The wonderful potential of puppets. Simply sublime, aren't they? Obedient assistants that don't complain when I ask them to dispatch my enemies—unlike their human counterparts.
111831010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Zwei, Murderous Puppet into your hand and subtract 1 from its cost.
111831010.evoFlair_: I made her in the same manner as the rest, so why... why is Zwei's mind so unstable?! Are my creations inferior to his? No! I won't stand for this!

113831020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +1/+1 and Storm.
Strike: Subtract 1 from the cost of all Machina cards in your hand.
113831020.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new advance after another. While the Mechagun Wielder and her gun commanded a great range, this machine gained a way of instantaneously closing a great distance. —Mechalab Sound Archives (File 002)
113831020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113831020.evoFlair_:
With the dawn of the mechanical age, the definition of an "optimal distance" has changed. Whether your objective is to overwhelm at close range or lay waste from a distance, the result is swift destruction regardless.
—Comparison of Aerial Craft and Mechagun Wielder

115831020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain +3/+3.
115831020.baseFlair_:
We've set up a perimeter around the fortress with not a single weakness in it. That fortress won't be moving a muscle. The people inside, I mean. Why would a fortress move?
—Army general
115831020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115831020.evoFlair_:
"Our perimeter was obliterated. Our troops were soundly beaten. We had no choice but to surrender. I think it might be time for me to consider retirement..."
—Army general

116831010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
116831010.baseFlair_:
To better meet our goals, we are now developing specialized devices. Among them: mechanical bodies that withstand forceful blows—blows that would make quick work of organic matter. Technology knows no limits.
—Tech Research and Development, Report 3
116831010.evoFlair_:
Machines are quickly progressing. We created them, improved them, taught them to walk. Now they no longer need pilots of flesh and blood. This mechanized speed is vital; it's what propels us into the future.
—Boon of Technology, Part 3

118831010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Guardform Golem. If at least 6 different allied Artifact cards have been destroyed this match, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
118831010.baseFlair_: You think you can just climb out of hell? Unfortunately, your misdeeds have finally caught up to you. Give it up. Stop resisting and let me do my job.
118831010.evoFlair_: I was created to serve the darkness, in opposition to the light. Though I bring chaos to the world, there is something else that takes precedence. Master, Master. Use me as your sword...

123831020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain the ability to attack 2 times per turn.
Enhance (8): Gain the ability to attack 3 times per turn instead.
123831020.baseFlair_: Man, when I was a kid, I always dreamed of flying around like a superhero, but now... now that anyone can fly, it doesn't feel as special.
123831020.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Summon an Ancient Artifact.
123831020.evoFlair_: Flying around protecting our airspace is just your average job. Anyone could do what I do, but it's made me realize... not all heroes wear capes. They're down there, workin' hard to make magic happen.

110841010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
110841010.baseFlair_: You can't take your eyes off me. My song and dance make everybody drop to their knees and pray to their idol! Can't deny it? Well, I'm the only thing that'll last past destruction anyway! Hehe—sounds like a fun trial for the world!
110841010.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Put a Destruction in White into your hand.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
110841010.evoFlair_: I'm here to sing and dance for you... So you better devote your lives to me. Just try and refuse! I'm an idol to literally everyone. Hehe—sounds like a fun trial for the world!

711841010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
711841010.baseFlair_: You can't take your eyes off me. My song and dance make everybody drop to their knees and pray to their idol! Can't deny it? Well, I'm the only thing that'll last past destruction anyway! Hehe—sounds like a fun trial for the world!
711841010.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Put a Destruction in White into your hand.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
711841010.evoFlair_: I'm here to sing and dance for you... So you better devote your lives to me. Just try and refuse! I'm an idol to literally everyone. Hehe—sounds like a fun trial for the world!

110841020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if at least 10 allied Artifacts cards have been destroyed this match, invoke this card.
----------
Ward.
110841020.baseFlair_:
Operations test: Complete. Confirming access.
Endurance check: Operator injured but conscious.
Examining battle readiness... Error. Too much stress on operator's brain.
"I... will kill... them. Protect... them... I..."
110841020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Put a random Artifact follower that costs 3 play points or less from your deck into play.
110841020.evoFlair_:
Final operations test: Cleared. Unlocking frame.
Final endurance test: Cleared. Integration successful.
Battle sequence... Commencing.
Objective: International war intervention.
"Who... to destroy? Who... to smash? Who... am I?"

114841020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of Artifact cards in your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points. Subtract 1 from the cost of all Artifact cards in your hand.
114841020.baseFlair_: Just as there are seven vices among mortals, there are seven virtues among the gods. The personification of humility seated on her heavenly throne calls out: "Psychomachia, in humility." Countless angels flock to the skies in response.
114841020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal X damage to a random enemy follower.
If no enemy followers are in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead. X equals the number of different allied Artifact cards destroyed during this match. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
114841020.evoFlair_: The seven virtues each rout one of the seven sins. Seeing greed fester in the earth below, a gentle voice calls out: "Mortals shall learn to be content." Countless angels descend to ensure that the statement becomes reality.

117841020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give a follower in your hand Fanfare - Recover 2 play points.
117841020.baseFlair_: It appears this dimension has yet to understand what control is. Without a strong leader, this plane will eventually wither and die. Then I will take control myself and birth a new generation devoted to obedience and fealty.
117841020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - Once on each of your turns, when you play a follower, recover 1 play point. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
117841020.evoFlair_: After traversing many dimensions, I've arrived at the conclusion that tyrants invariably bring about society's end. This world will extol my generosity. Control should not be constricting like chains but delicate like thread.

118841030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, evolve this follower and recover 2 play points.
118841030.baseFlair_: The people have chosen to open the floodgates of discovery, turning their backs away from this paradise. I must deter them from this foolishness and see that they have a change of heart.
118841030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118841030.evoFlair_: Only despair lies beyond the locked door. Though many wish to pass through, the scales of balance will not suffer a new world. Those intent on pursuing this path should ready themselves for condemnation by my hand.

122841010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 6 different allied Artifact cards have been destroyed this match, put 2 Cannon Artifacts into your hand.
122841010.baseFlair_:
Your opponent? Why, none other than yours truly. If you really are the chosen one, prove it! Show the world what a worthy savior looks like!
—Leon Aurenche
122841010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Summon a Guard Artifact and Defense Artifact.
122841010.evoFlair_:
A true test of strength should push you to your limits. For the hardship of being born anew is not something to be endured, but overcome! Now let us usher in a new era—Genesis Artifact!
—Leon Aurenche

123841030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Put 1 of the following cards into your hand. If at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, put all 3 into your hand instead.
-New Prayer
-New Destruction
-Melodious Monody
Can't be destroyed by effects.
123841030.baseFlair_: You love me more than anything, right? All you need is me, riiight? Then what are you waiting for? Go destroy all my competition and maaaybe I'll answer your prayers for a song! That's your next trial!
123841030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Reanimate (0), Reanimate (1), and Reanimate (2).
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
123841030.evoFlair_: You've been begging for an encore to unleash all the destructive urges you've been holding in. Aaand, by making you wait for it, those urges grew! You need me. All you think about is me. This brand new melody's gonna destroy everything else!

900841060.baseEffect_:
Storm.
At the start of your turn, combine with an allied Marionette//Uno to become a Marionette//Tre.
900841060.baseFlair_: Sadness. Next the girl learned sadness when she saw the inequality that plagues the world of men. "How come there are people who can't be saved!"
900841060.evoFlair_: Sadness. The girl's heart ached to learn that the human world is controlled by laws. "These people will be miserable forever."

900841170.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
Last Words: Restore 4 defense to your leader.
900841170.baseFlair_: Yap all you want; chase after your golden tomorrows... You aren't getting past this!
900841170.evoFlair_: A tentacle forged of 100% cold steel. It mocks Mother Earth by boring into Her crust, spreading roots as if to mimic the flora of Her grand creation. She resists its chill, but there is no bond it cannot sever.

900841180.baseEffect_:
Storm.
If this follower can be targeted by enemy effects, your opponent can only target this follower.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
900841180.baseFlair_: Bleurgh. Don't look at me like that—you'll infect me with your hope-cooties. You know what? You, your meager futures... I'm crushing them all!
900841180.evoFlair_: A tentacle forged of 100% cruel steel. It smites Mother Earth by darting over Her face, spreading calamity as if to mimic the fauna of Her grand creation. She resists its spite, but there is no love it cannot rend.

900841250.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
900841250.baseFlair_:
The wall that stands in our way is high indeed. Will your fighting spirit be enough to dominate it, I wonder?
—Leon Aurenche
900841250.evoFlair_:
I must confess, my expectations for your abilities are quite high.
—Leon Aurenche

900841260.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Reduce damage from effects to 0.
900841260.baseFlair_:
The wall that stands in our way is resilient indeed. Do you have what it takes to break through, I wonder?
—Leon Aurenche
900841260.evoFlair_:
Your skill shall be put to the test. I hope you don't disappoint me.
—Leon Aurenche

112814010.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower that costs 2 play points or less, then summon an allied copy of that follower.
If Resonance is active for you, put a Puppet into your hand.
112814010.baseFlair_: If you see the strings of a puppet, it's because its master no longer saw fit to hide them.

100824010.baseEffect_:
Put 3 Puppets into your hand.
Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
100824010.baseFlair_: I thought I'd make you a puppet of my own, but you seem to resist the idea. Do you value your freedom so much? Very well then—I suppose I'll have your life instead.

111824010.baseEffect_: Banish an enemy follower with 4 defense or less. Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, put 2 Artifact cards into your hand instead.
111824010.baseFlair_: A great rift tore the sky open, revealing another sky beyond it. —A farmer's memoirs

116824010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Puppet. Then destroy X random enemy followers. X equals the number of allied Puppets in play.
Destroy all allied Puppets.
116824010.baseFlair_: Even a puppet needs to cut loose.

126824010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon an Airstrike Artifact or Barrier Artifact.
Enhance (6): Summon both instead.
126824010.baseFlair_: The artifact didn't get buried over time—it was deliberately buried. And soon, they would come to know why.

110834010.baseEffect_: Destroy an allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown. Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the cost of that card.
110834010.baseFlair_: Keep your eyes on your idol, everybody! Show me how much you love me! Show me how much you worship me!

116834010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as a Yuwan's Fury or Belphomet's Crackdown.
If Resonance is active for you, instead summon a Mystic Artifact and Ancient Artifact, and randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Tisiphone, the Malignant
-Alecto, the Dissonant
-Megaera, the Indignant
116834010.baseFlair_: The soldiers have gathered their courage; they are now ready to war against fate. A single voice rings out like a shot over the silent ranks. "The time has come to take up arms. Come, let us carve a path to the future!" The rebellion has begun.

900834040.baseEffect_:
Give +4/+4 to an allied follower.
If that follower is Shin, Lawful Light, transform it into Shin, Chaotic Darkness.
900834040.baseFlair_:
Well, now that you've seen me, let's make a new world order. Yes, I will plunge this world into darkness.
—Shin, Chaotic Darkness

108822010.baseEffect_: Whenever an artifact follower that originally costs at least 3 play points comes into play, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader instead.
108822010.baseFlair_: From progress comes innovation, and from innovation comes progress.

107811040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
107811040.baseFlair_: Swords? Totally barbaric. It's all about firepower, baby!
107811040.evoFlair_: Bringing a sword to a gun fight? Ha! I'd like to see you try, buddy.

107811120.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet is destroyed gain +1/+1.
107811120.baseFlair_: Incomplete, insufficient, imperfect and abandoned by its master. But despite everything, it lives.
107811120.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107811120.evoFlair_: Reduced to nothing and recreated from nothing. The mask effectively conceals a steady stream of tears.

109811030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Gilgamesh into your hand if Resonance is active for you.
109811030.baseFlair_: The oblivious beast of clay is no more. Through the wisdom of Shamhat, I have awakened and carry this name. Together with the hero, I'll take on this world once again.
109811030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
109811030.evoFlair_: Gugalanna, lords of the stars, what have you, it matters not. Those who bear their fangs to my dearest will be slain—even gods. For my one dear friend, I'll risk it all.

111811020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown, and then summon an Analyzing Artifact.
111811020.baseFlair_: Yesss! Destroy, destroy, destroy! But if we diiid decide to keep something after all has been smashed to bits, perhaps it may be an idol... A beacon for the world, crafted by my very own hands.
111811020.evoFlair_: Follow her into the deepest of shadows. To recreate the idol of destruction herself is to earn the authority to destroy—and within the shadow of destruction lies creation.

120811020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon an Ancient Artifact and Analyzing Artifact. Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
Enhance (9): Summon 2 Ancient Artifacts and 2 Analyzing Artifacts and put 2 Paradigm Shifts into your hand instead.
120811020.baseFlair_: I'm not going to wait around for the R&D budget to get approved! If you want to get things done, you've got to actively reach out to patrons and sponsors!
120811020.evoFlair_: I can practically see the smiles on the kids' faces once they get their hands on my creations! That's right! I've got plenty of dreams, and I'll grasp them all with these hands of mine!

123811010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Destroy a random allied follower and random enemy follower.
Enhance (8): Destroy 2 instead.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
123811010.baseFlair_: Destroy, destroy, destroy! Her song is our anthem—our rebellion! It's our duty as worshippers to destroy her competition. We don't need anything or anyone else!
123811010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
123811010.evoFlair_: The Ten Omens were bestowed upon the world on a tablet of sapphire stone. Upon the trials' completion, the stone crumbled, but devoted disciples of destruction prayed to their idol for an encore.

126811030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
If this follower was summoned with an effect, evolve it.
126811030.baseFlair_:
Every scratch and speck of rust on this relic gives us more insight into the past. What threats did this civilization face, that they had to build so mighty a machine? The prospect of learning more fills me with excitement.
—Relic Researcher's Journal
126811030.evoFlair_:
"KO! And the winner is the Great Piledriver!"
"Whooooa! Piiile-dri-ver! Piiile-dri-ver!"
—Scene from an Ancient Mecha Battle Stadium

900811040.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: If it is your turn, then put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If it is your opponent's turn, draw a card.
900811040.baseFlair_: Forged potential of ivory—a guide to the proper way, simply a matter of course.
900811040.evoFlair_: Chaotic potential of obsidian—the proper way is but only one, for infinite opportunities exist.

900811080.baseFlair_: This device is a barrier. It wards its master from obliteration... by first obliterating the would-be destroyer.
900811080.evoFlair_: This device is a barrier, secure until the bitter end. Its every nut, bolt, and feature was designed to protect. It doesn't fear destruction because it exists for one reason: to serve its master.

900811090.baseFlair_: This device is meant to reap. And there is nothing it can't harvest.
900811090.evoFlair_: This device is meant to steal life away. It was perfectly designed by its master to do so.

900811100.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
900811100.baseFlair_: Soar—that is what you were created to do. Revert reason, bring chaos to order.
900811100.evoFlair_: Soar—that is what you were created to do. Before you, all reason and all existence crumbles into chaos.

107821090.baseEffect_: Whenever an effect puts cards into your deck, gain +1/+0.
107821090.baseFlair_: In our experiments, we paired a human's body with a demon's blood. Using the organs of a beast, and a heart of black iron, we created something unspeakable, unidentifiable.
107821090.evoFlair_: Not human, demon, nor beast. It swelled as if it were water, and moaned in agony. We created something truly horrifying that day—an abomination without purpose.

107821100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand. Give +0/+1 and Ward to all Puppets in your hand.
107821100.baseFlair_: Comparable to a spider, the doll quickly latches onto any unfortunate soul entangled in its intricately woven threads.
107821100.evoFlair_: Its entangled threads stained with drops of vermillion, the true nature of the doll is revealed as it greedily devours its prey.

108821020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card that costs at least 3 play points from your deck into your hand.
108821020.baseFlair_: Talking's... something I'm pretty bad at. That's why this thing... does the talking for me. My new arm...
108821020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108821020.evoFlair_: Talking's not... what I do well. I think I'll come in handy too. Let's battle together... I'll do everything I can.

109821020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Go, Go, Robomi!
Enhance (8): Subtract 3 from that amulet's Countdown.
109821020.baseFlair_: So your name's Robomi, huh? It's amazing that an eons-old machina soldier can move and talk. I'm Nicholas, and I'll be taking care of your maintenance from now on, Robomi!
109821020.evoFlair_: The same technology used to create Robomi... I'll use it to protect the ones I love! Gigante Suit ready! Nicholas, lifting off!

126821020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Follower Strike: Banish the enemy follower.
126821020.baseFlair_:
Report: North District gone. Enemy firepower exceeds anything humanity can muster. ■■■ injured (no fatalities). Supplemental Report: They defended against our attacks with so few agents? We're screwed.
—Alterplane Intruder Battle Report 1
126821020.evoFlair_:
"gOOd mOrning. hEllO. ThANKS. Abso...ed l...nguage, stiLL l...rning. D...N't c...y. We will be k...nd masters. This world is GooD. Don't cry. We will st...p your tEa...s."
—Alterplane Intruder Battle Report 2 (Source Unknown)

900821030.baseFlair_: This unit's name is Robomi. You have been registered as this unit's new engineer, Nicholas.
900821030.evoFlair_: Charging complete. Preparing Hyper Megaton Kick.

107831020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. Repeat once if Resonance is active for you.
107831020.baseFlair_: Entirety set right. Naught set to its counter. Now, you too must step upon the scales.
107831020.evoFlair_: Bear the burden of this world and the weight of mankind—achieve equilibrium and balance the heavens and earth.

116831020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Machina or Natura follower from your hand into play. Give it Rush and the following effect: At the end of your turn, return this follower to your hand.
116831020.baseFlair_:
Concept: Automated artillery barrage
Subjects: All organisms capable of conveying laser turrets
Mission: Development of creature that is weapon and carrier in one
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team Z
116831020.evoFlair_:
Organic life has donned steel, shouldered machinery, and assumed the robe of power. It roars, "We reign supreme; these machines are our attendants." This biological drive for dominance is vital; it's what propels us into the future.
—In Defense of Machines, Part 2

117831010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Recover X play points. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, draw a card. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, subtract 2 from its cost.
117831010.baseFlair_: I am the Two of Swords, exemplar of denial. The only path is forward. The only thing worth honing is skill. Nothing else matters. All these tools are at my disposal. No one will stand in my way.
117831010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117831010.evoFlair_: He is a master swordsman; his ideal state is stillness. To him, nothing need exist... Yet he realizes: he denies, therefore he is. Quickly, he turns his tools towards his own mind; he shreds away at his consciousness, hoping to one day return to his purest form.

119831030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Evolve an unevolved allied Puppet. Draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: Summon 3 Puppets.
Last Words: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
119831030.baseFlair_:
True power means never having to bow to anyone else's will. I created this puppet as a tool to help me achieve that kind of freedom... But then a thought occurred to me: can I even control this thing?
—Gripes of a Genius Puppet Crafter
119831030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119831030.evoFlair_:
Master says I'm big, and strong, and well made. Master says I can't be controlled by others. But I'm just a puppet... I can't do anything without somebody pulling my strings!
—Gripes of a Powerful Puppet

121831020.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if Resonance has been activated for you at least 10 times this match, invoke this card.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare and Last Words: Draw a card.
121831020.baseFlair_: A peerless feat of engineering made for defensive and curative tasks. She flies to those needing help, offering first aid, rescue, or other medical services. Once she completes them, she departs. She isn't equipped with sentience, but why in heaven would she need that?
121831020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121831020.evoFlair_: "Dear goddess! You are mercy incarnate! We beseech your protection!" The patient bows at the maiden's feet; she cannot answer, for she has not been programmed to respond to non-essential conversation. "We bask in your love! How fortunate we are!"

125831020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower. Give your leader the following effect: Whenever Resonance becomes active for you, recover 1 play point. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
125831020.baseFlair_: I am but an instrument of fate, enacting its decrees. To save mankind from devastation, I don these wings and proffer my life. Strange... I had thought all emotion stripped from me long ago. Why does this sensation linger...?
125831020.evoFlair_:
Wings clipped and fallen from paradise, I return to the light. I was once an older brother to two...
"Go with Rosa and be free, Cassim." "Norn... Brother..."
My dearest sister and brother... You've grown strong, and kind. Thank you.

107841020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Spinaria's Artifact.
Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give that follower the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
107841020.baseFlair_: These artifacts move at my command, but they do nothing for my lonely heart.
107841020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107841020.evoFlair_: Somebody, anybody! Please rescue me from this life of solitude. For such a companion, I would do anything...

704841010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Spinaria's Artifact.
Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give that follower the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
704841010.baseFlair_: These artifacts move at my command, but they do nothing for my lonely heart.

704841010.evoFlair_: Somebody, anybody! Please rescue me from this life of solitude. For such a companion, I would do anything...

-Whenever you play an Artifact card, recover 1 play point.

(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
107841030.baseFlair_: Someone has to make sure fate stays in balance. I can restore order, or let chaos consume this world. Now then, which one will it be?
107841030.evoFlair_: Rotate the eternal wheel of fate, and the truth of the world reveals itself. Reach the limits of the world so that it may change forevermore. How far will you go?

111841010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. If the total cost of allied Artifact cards destroyed during this match is at least 20, deal 5 damage instead.
111841010.baseFlair_: Look, life's not about following the pack, nor about creating a name for yourself. It's like this—when you get to be a certain age, you begin to see the right path. Eye for an eye, tooth for a tooth. That's why you gotta fight only those that are ready for it.
111841010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
111841010.evoFlair_: Look, I don't plan to boast. The fact this sword chose me is just coincidence, you see. But even us older folk, we've got dreams. It doesn't embarrass me at all to say that's why I live my life rewarding virtue and punishing vice.

113841020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Puppets.
----------
Fanfare: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
113841020.baseFlair_:
Fear. Rage. Hatred. Affection—no, it's useless. I can't express all my heart feels for you. But I wonder... What do you make of me now?
—Orchis, Linked Heart
113841020.evoFlair_: From near and far, she sought a heart. The purpose of her creation. Her purpose in this world. Seeking the knowledge for herself, she continues her journey. As the answers are revealed, her heart beats on.

117841030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Spinaria & Lucille, Keepers into your deck.
When an allied Artifact card comes into play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
117841030.baseFlair_: I'm not good at fighting, and it certainly isn't fun, but I made a promise to stick by you, Spinaria! I'll never abandon my big sister!
117841030.evoFlair_:
Lucille said I was important to her... My chest feels... warm. I think I'm happy.
—Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas

716841030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Spinaria & Lucille, Keepers into your deck.
When an allied Artifact card comes into play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.

716841030.evoFlair_:
Lucille said I was important to her... My chest feels...warm. I think I'm happy.
—Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas

122841020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If at least 3 of your evolution points have been used this match, summon a Monolith Creator and give it Storm.
Strike: Give -2/-2 to all enemy followers, then remove this effect. (Followers are destroyed when their defense drops below 1.)
122841020.baseFlair_: Incomplete. Infantile. Juvenile dimensions everywhere. Yes... Perfect. Lovely. So much potential within each and every one of them... My monoliths shall be a gift to you. Infinite potential awaits.
122841020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
122841020.evoFlair_: Will I be your annihilator, or your savior? Total destruction or unprecedented glory—which will it be? Not knowing is half the fun. I can't wait... Hurry up and come play with me!

124841010.baseEffect_:
Maneuver: Festive followers that originally cost 4 play points or less
When this follower becomes Maneuverable, deal 6 damage to all enemy followers and then 3 damage to the enemy leader.
When the follower Maneuvering this follower returns to play, transform it into a Magna Saber.
124841010.baseFlair_:
Make sure you catch my good side, too! Ahem... On three now, boys and girls! A new dawn arises! Magna... Saber!
—Magna Saber
124841010.evoFlair_:
Molding process complete—engaging Magna Mode! Chachako, take charge of firepower! Shokichi, stand by for calculations! Now then... let's put on a show for our lovely guests! All systems go!
—Magna Saber

900841270.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if at least 5 allied followers that cost at least 5 play points have been destroyed this match, invoke this card.
----------
When this follower comes into play, summon a World Eliminator.
When this follower leaves play, put 2 Ruiner of Edens into your deck. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
900841270.baseFlair_:
Hope withers and fades. Reach for it as you may, it will always remain out of reach. That, my friend, is true destruction.
—Leon Aurenche
900841270.evoFlair_:
There is no point in trying to prevent domination when you've already been dominated. You seem to be the only one who hasn't realized this.
—Leon Aurenche

900841290.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Increase your leader's maximum defense by 2 and restore 2 defense to your leader.
900841290.baseFlair_:
The bigger, the better! Let us go out with a bang, I say—this celebration is reserved only for the truly devoted!
—Leon Aurenche
900841290.evoFlair_:
A world of never-ending failure and disappointment. I shall become the new savior of such an imperfect world. That is my plan.
—Leon Aurenche

900841300.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
Last Words: Put a Summon Divine Treasure without Enhance into your hand.
900841300.baseFlair_: A dutiful servant of a warped and twisted will, it acts as a vessel for duplicity. It seeks to root out all those who would defile the innocence of its master.
900841300.evoFlair_:
No! Stop it! I...I don't want to die. I want to live, damn it! I want to live!
—Mauro Abelard

117814010.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower. Then deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the destroyed follower's attack.
117814010.baseFlair_: I hate attention. I get enough of that from doll aficionados.

109824010.baseEffect_:
Select 2 followers in play. Deal X damage to the first follower and Y damage to the second follower. X equals the attack of the second follower and Y equals the attack of the first follower.
(Can be played only when 2 targetable followers are in play.)
109824010.baseFlair_: I'll transcribe your cries to my scores and use those tears to play my orchestra! Let the concerto begin...

107834010.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower.
Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
107834010.baseFlair_: Somewhere within the vast, infinite reaches of this dimension, surely there's a place befitting you.
