108834010.baseFlair_: "This is a fight for Orchis!" "If that's what you want, then it's what you'll get!" —Zwei and Orchis

109834010.baseEffect_:
Transform an Artifact card in your hand into an Artifact Spark.
Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
(Can be played only when a targetable Artifact card is in your hand.)
109834010.baseFlair_: Only through the perspective of man can nothingness be. Through the perspective of the universe, even nothing exists as something.

900844040.baseEffect_:
Summon 3 Wretches.
If at least 20 allied followers have been destroyed this match, give them Storm.
900844040.baseFlair_: What is this pain which grips my chest? Is it anger? Confusion? Are... are you my prey? Why can't I remember?

100811050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
100811050.baseFlair_: My mission has only just begun—this flesh of iron will be your end!
100811050.evoFlair_: My mission continues—you will not survive, for I am black iron incarnate!

107811080.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain +1/+0 and Ward.
107811080.baseFlair_: They ain't much to look at, but they're everything to me... You won't lay a hand on my crew—these arms are for protecting!
107811080.evoFlair_: What'd you say to me, punk? Never underestimate a pirate! Don't say I didn't warn ya—these arms are for fighting!

113811030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Gain +3/+3.
113811030.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. We set out to create a prototype soldier— instead, a different beast was born. At times it takes the form of man. At others, a monster. We had no way of predicting it. —Mechalab Sound Archives (File 001)
113811030.evoFlair_: With the dawn of the mechanical age, the definition of the "optimal figure" has changed. Whether a creation takes form as a skillful man or powerful beast, either one shall serve its purpose effortlessly. —Comparison of Mechanical Mammoth and Prototype Soldier

119811030.baseFlair_: Liking toys is fine; just don't get too attached to 'em. For those of us who fix toys, drawing that line helps us to maintain our professionalism. Well, look at you, Mr. Hoot-hoot! Now that we've fixed up your casing, you look like a brand-new bird!
119811030.evoFlair_: Don't get me wrong, you've gotta put some heart into it if you want to do a good job. But it won't do to get personally invested in every toy you meet. Aww, Mr. Hoot-hoot, it's almost time for us to say goodbye... Why's this gotta be so hard?!

109821010.baseFlair_: This... This must be the inner garden. Ahaha... I've arrived! To think all I needed to make it to the promised land was cross that pathetic barrier!
109821010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish all enemy followers with 3 defense or less.
109821010.evoFlair_: Now then, how should I start with this garden's destruction? Aha... I know just the trick. I'll thoroughly grind it to dust! Ahaha!

107831010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Evolve this follower and change its attack to X until the end of the turn. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards destroyed this match.
107831010.baseFlair_: A synthetic body, a synthetic life, a crossbreed. Neither human nor beast, what is my purpose in this life?
107831010.evoFlair_: What is my purpose in this life? I'll find my true purpose and make something of myself someday—just watch!

114831010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if Resonance is active for you or if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, summon a Cannon Hermit Crab and change its attack and defense to X/Y. X and Y are equal to half this follower's attack and defense (rounded up).
114831010.baseFlair_:
Concept: Waterproof and fully automated.
Subjects: Creatures already accustomed to armor.
Mission: Protect the peace without the need for human personnel.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team C
114831010.evoFlair_: The giant hermit crab peacekeeping experiment came to a most startling conclusion: the number of test subject crabs no longer matched up with the number of equipment sets produced. Further investigation will be required to find out why. For the good of all of us.

120831010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Destroy an allied follower. Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
----------
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, recover 2 play points.
Whenever an allied Artifact follower is destroyed, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
120831010.baseFlair_: Mankind's potential is worthless. That's why I've given up on it—so they can't use it against me. There's nothing anymore that I can trust. Not you, not even my own potential.
120831010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120831010.evoFlair_: I'm just an expendable tool. But if you think you can use me, you've got another thing coming. I'll break you before you even try. The only thing I can believe in is the fact that everything breaks.

126831010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Destroy an allied Artifact card. Restore 2 defense to your leader. Draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: Summon copies of 3 different random allied Artifact followers of different costs destroyed this match.
126831010.baseFlair_: You're all under my control... and yet some of you rebel. I won't hold it against you, but giving in will make things so much easier. I won't let anyone stand in my way. I swore I would do anything for her.
126831010.evoFlair_: Mother is the only one who accepted me, so I'll do anything she asks. And then, she'll praise me, tell me I've done a good job. Unlike you, she's not a machine... With her, I can feel warm again.

110841030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish all cards in your deck. Then put 10 Mystic Artifacts, 10 Radiant Artifacts, and 10 Prime Artifacts into your deck.
110841030.baseFlair_: After they were abandoned by their god, the sages began to dream. They would remake their philosophy, the laws of the world... the world itself. Thousands of forsaken souls united to give birth to a single mechanism. A single whole. A single... order.
110841030.evoFlair_: The new order burst from the old world's body, turned, and consumed it. One planet was not enough to sate its hunger; and so it devoured and grew. As it waxed in size and power, it knew it was no mere creation. It was the sum and the genesis of all the cosmos's principles.

112841030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish all Machina cards from your deck. Put X Tisiphone, the Malignants, Y Alecto, the Dissonants, and Z Megaera, the Indignants into your deck. X, Y, and Z equal the number of Machina cards banished from your deck split randomly.
112841030.baseFlair_: What value is there in emotion? It's all just a dumb processing error. That's why I have to reclaim, reduce, and recycle them all—they're junk! Junk that I created! It hurts the pride to see your creations grow inefficient!
112841030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Machina card from your deck into your hand.
112841030.evoFlair_: Stop laughing. Stop crying. And stop staring at me like that. You're going to make me vomit with those stupid expressions. You know what, forget it. It's termination for you. I'll wring the oxygen from your lungs, the tears from your ducts, and the life from your body!

113841030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Summon a Lloyd the Android or Marionette//Uno.
Whenever an allied Lloyd the Android comes into play, give it +2/+2.
Whenever an allied Marionette//Uno comes into play, summon a Marionette//Due.
113841030.baseFlair_:
I was spiteful. I was jealous. I wanted to erase you—surpass you.
But... I don't know anymore. Are we even enemies? What are we? I... I wonder what to even make of you anymore.
—Zwei, Resonant Heart
113841030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Transform a Puppet in your hand into a Marionette//Tre.
Whenever an allied Lloyd the Android comes into play, give it +2/+2.
Whenever an allied Marionette//Uno comes into play, summon a Marionette//Due.
113841030.evoFlair_: From within her heart, she sought the answers. The folly of humanity. The righteousness of humanity. Seeking to witness them herself, she continues her journey. As the answers are revealed, her heart beats on.

116841030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever an allied Machina or Natura follower attacks, recover 1 play point.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower. Then, if you have at least 3, deal 3 damage to all enemies.
116841030.baseFlair_: Its claws are state-of-the-art. They warp virtual mass and crush stars into dust. But to the great bear, even these ruinous weapons are but appendages. Fear not the blade—fear the flesh that wields it.
116841030.evoFlair_:
Activating Ometeotl: all systems online.
Code: FMD. OpticPilot, ready to go.
Inputting extermination sequence... Approved.
Things are about to get ugly.
—Ralmia, Sonic Racer

120841010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon a Spinaria's Artifact.
----------
Fanfare: Choose - Summon 2 of the following cards. If at least 6 different allied Artifact cards have been destroyed this match, summon all 3 instead.
-Airstrike Artifact
-Keenedge Artifact
-Barrier Artifact
120841010.baseFlair_: Destroy them all, artifacts. There is no kindness to be found among the people here. I've been alone; I've always been alone. I'm done with this unkind world, and so my artifacts will break everything.
120841010.evoFlair_: I don't need happiness anymore. Why would I, when everybody's so cruel and the world is filled with sadness? I'll get rid of what I don't need, and what I do I'll destroy anyway! I want this world and everyone in it to leave my sight!

124841030.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Put a Mercurial Might into your hand.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Mercurial Might into your hand and subtract 1 from its cost.
Reduce damage from effects to 0.
Can't be destroyed or banished by effects.
124841030.baseFlair_: No matter how you pierce, tear, or crush it, her aegis is unyielding. However, it is not the formless mercury that constitutes it, but rather her unbending will that makes it indestructible.
124841030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
124841030.evoFlair_: The brilliant mercury changes form as its wielder wills. In the wrong hands, it can be a treacherous power—so she vows to use it for good with unwavering determination.

125841010.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Puppets
Whenever cards are fused to this card, summon a Puppet and give it +1/+0.
----------
Fanfare: If this card is fused with at least 1 card, summon a Lloyd, Orchis's Puppet. If fused with at least 3 cards, evolve it and this follower.
125841010.baseFlair_: The more one studies, the easier it is to realize true knowledge requires experience—that of kindness, warmth, and love. Of anger, sorrow, and hate. Even the same phenomenon manifests differently for others. There are as many emotions as there are hearts to feel them.
125841010.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, give it Storm.
125841010.evoFlair_: No matter how much we study and learn, we cannot know everything. What's odd is that I see this not as something to lament, but to rejoice over. Our journey continues. From now, until the end. I'm sure it will be a wonderful one.

900841070.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Last Words: Summon a Marionette//Uno and a Marionette//Due.
900841070.baseFlair_: Hatred. Last the girl despaired at the world of men and began to hate. "If these people won't learn, if they're going to be miserable forever, then—"
900841070.evoFlair_: Hatred. The girl finally came to despise the world as unsavable. "If this is how the world is, then someone should crush it to pieces!"

900841320.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Ward.
At the end of your turn, give 2 random enemy followers the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn: Can't attack.
900841320.baseFlair_: Lies, deception, fabrication. All integral parts to the puppet Lloyd, a marionette drawn and manipulated by silvery strings. Wherever the girl goes, no matter the journey or its hardships, Lloyd follows, never leaving her side.
900841320.evoFlair_:
Her stone-faced expression isn't fooling anyone. One look at all the care she's put into maintaining her puppet says it all. Hehe. But I guess that goes for me too, doesn't it, Victoria?
—Zwei, Resonant Heart

124834010.baseEffect_:
Put a random Portalcraft follower that originally costs 5 play points from your deck into play.
Then, if any allied Festive followers are in play, recover 3 play points.
124834010.baseFlair_:
What's this?! My danger sensors... are over 9000! Canceling hospitality mode. Engaging battle mode... It's time to rock! Get your cameras ready, ladies and gentlemen! Magna... Transformation!
—Karakuri Inn Work Log, Audio File 5

110811020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
110811020.baseFlair_:
Did you hear about the statue our neighbors gave us?
"Targets identified. Changing to battle mode."
After it started movin', it crushed a lot of good men.
"Strengthening battle parameters."
110811020.evoFlair_:
No matter what we did, it kept fighting.
"Damage minimal. Continuing battle operations."
When reinforcements arrived, it transformed.
"More targets acquired. Switching to annihilation mode."

114811010.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, put an Analyzing Artifact and an Ancient Artifact into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
114811010.baseFlair_: Purifying rays, shining volley! Oh? One of the monsters actually survived. All right then, I'll just have to take it head-on!
114811010.evoFlair_:
"Not bad, not bad at all! I could get used to your brand of archery! Why don't you sail the seas with us aboard my ship, lassie?"
"Nah, I don't think I'd be able to stand you. I'll pass."
—Captain Meteo and Dazzling Archer

121811020.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Put a Bifurcating Artifact and Paradigm Shift into your hand.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Guardform Golem and Strikeform Golem. Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
121811020.baseFlair_: Yeek! Uh, um, what brings you to this research facility? Huh?! You're interested in my coil research? Oh wow, you have no idea how happy that makes me! Where should I begin? Right, it's probably faster to show you. Um, you might wanna brace yourself for the zap!
121811020.evoFlair_: As you've likely experienced, this new coil tech is a game-changing technology that can control electrical output via directive algorithms. With this, we can power apparatus efficiently and sweep through hostiles in a— Oh. Oh no. I think I've accidentally fried them...

124811030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Transform all other followers into Clown Dolls.
124811030.baseFlair_: Things going okay for you, new guy? You're lookin' a bit stiff out there. Remember, you're a clown now. So lose whatever shame you have left and give them a real show!
124811030.evoFlair_: Haha! I knew you'd get used to it eventually. I mean, look at that smooth joint action! And don't worry—you'll forget all about your family back home soon!

126811020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon an Enhanced Puppet and Puppet.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals that follower's attack.
126811020.baseFlair_:
Won't you tie my string of fate around your little finger? I want you all to myself, even if it's only for tonight. I will be your prince, and you will be my princess.
Hey, a bottle of our finest for the princess, please!
126811020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
126811020.evoFlair_:
You're not a puppet. You have a heart, and I bet you're hiding your pain behind that smile. Just remember, until the sun rises, I'm yours to command—I'll do anything to put a smile on your face.
Oh, your glass is empty; let me fill it. Now, bottoms up!

900811060.baseEffect_: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, summon a Prime Artifact.
900811060.baseFlair_: The entity has no consciousness of its own. But it was constructed for a reason: to continue endlessly onward; to advance. To surpass all conscious beings.
900811060.evoFlair_: The entity has no principles of its own. But it was made to fulfill an ideal: light is a signal of one's advancement. It will make all conscious beings bow down before it.

107821050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of remaining Artifact cards in your deck.
107821050.baseFlair_:
A construct of bronze, created to serve as a guardian of the south island. It never misses its rounds—once in the morning, once in the afternoon, and once in the evening.
—Island Tales, Chapter 2
107821050.evoFlair_:
As time marched on, the people eventually forgot its purpose. Even so, its trembles can be heard like clockwork—once in the morning, once in the afternoon, and once in the evening.
—Island Tales, Chapter 3

107831060.baseEffect_:
Can't attack the enemy leader.
At the end of your turn, randomly destroy an allied Artifact follower. Deal damage to the enemy leader equal to that follower's cost.
107831060.baseFlair_: FLY TODAY. FLY TOMORROW. FLY ANYWHERE AS ORDERED BY MASTER / A SHELL (DIVINE BULLET).
107831060.evoFlair_: FLY TODAY. FLY TOMORROW. MASTER OCCASIONALLY TAKES A RIDE / A CARRIAGE (DIVINE TRANSPORT)

108831010.baseFlair_: No one mocks me! I mean, I'm perfect! If you can't accept that, then I won't accept you!
